Cheap and disposable. These are normally only used by civilians. They make large obvious targets.

TechManual.value: This is used for the conveyance of basic materials.

items.TechManual: Used to transport troops and other personnel across the surface of worlds with relative safety. This is the smaller, lighter version.
Used to transport troops and other personnel across the surface of worlds with relative safety.
Capable of transporting large amounts of ore across the surface of the world. It is remote controlled so should be accompanied by other vehicles for the pilots.
This is a general purpose cargo vehicle capable of Shuttle Movement.
This is the larger general purpose cargo vehicle capable of Shuttle Movement.
Useful for attempting to get troops into a combat without being destroyed during a space battle. Lower area, higher defence - less chance of being destroyed. It has sacrificed weaponry for speed.

TechManual.value: It is slightly faster than the APC.

items.TechManual: The vehicle uses multiple but weak attacks. These are designed for soft targets such as troops and low mass/defense items.
This aircraft is used to attack enemy ground forces during ground combat bombing phase. Does not require fighter bays to launch.
Ground fighters perform the same role as Space Interceptors. They run cover for the ground bombers, intercepting enemy ground fighters and ground bombers. Does not require fighter bays to launch.
Super advanced land mines that work in defence. The mass is due to the area that they are placed over. Landmines only work while the enemy controls less than 20% of the base.
This small armoured vehicle is relatively quick (for a surface vehicle anyway) but is lacking in defense per MU when compared with larger tanks.
This small armoured vehicle is relatively quick (for a surface vehicle anyway) but is lacking in defense per MU when compared with larger tanks.
It is standard ground combat vehicle. The name covers any number of variations and weaponry.
It is standard ground combat vehicle. The name covers any number of variations and weaponry.

TechManual.value: Heavy tanks have the thickest armour of the tank world.

items.TechManual: Capable of shuttle movement. Light and poorly armoured. Basically designed as a jump tank.
Colonists, unlike civilians (whose sale to a world is considered their fare) are people looking to for free passage to a new world. Their only value is in being seeded into the planetary population.
Designed primarily for civilian use, these are largely inferior to standard light tanks but their low maintenance makes them attractive for integration into civilian infrastructure.
Robotic Defence Bunkers are automated installations that are used to defend a position during ground assault. They cannot be used offensively.
Robotic Defence Bunkers are automated installations that are used to defend a position during ground assault. They cannot be used offensively.
Robotic Defence Bunkers are automated installations that are used to defend a position during ground assault. They cannot be used offensively.
These devices make use of the low penetration rapid fire capability used against aircraft but on a permanent platform thereby being only defensive in nature.
These devices make use of the low penetration rapid fire capability used against aircraft but on a permanent platform thereby being only defensive in nature.
These devices make use of the low penetration rapid fire capability used against aircraft but on a permanent platform thereby being only defensive in nature.
Warbots are a common sight during Periphery ground combat. They weigh the same as an ordinary troop but have superior combat factors. They however need operators to function effectively.

This is used as a special action to remove vegetation from a sector. 1000mu will convert a region into a dust region. This will modify the planetary values appropriately. It can be deployed by a ship or ground party only. As it is launched from high altitude, discovering the position responsible may be difficult.

This basic defoliant can be used to clear an area of vegetation. While powerful, it is no match for other non-producible products. It normally takes a few weeks to take effect and can be countered through the use of basic elements on a 1:1 basis. It normally requires 1000mu's per sector to convert a vegetation sector into an appropriate non-vegetative region. The defoliants are short lived biodegradable and a region will normally be colonised from plants within adjacent sectors within a few short months of being defoliated.
While having only the same strength as the tractor beam, the field projector sweeps a much larger region making it nearly impossible to miss the target.

A neural net wired into the hull of the ship. It does the job of 25 crew (100 crew factors), but is extremely susceptable to damage. These are only operational when installed on ships. They do not count on starbases, ground parties and platforms.

A neural net wired into the hull of the ship. It replaces crew, but is extremely susceptable to damage. These are only operational when installed on ships. They do not count on starbases, ground parties and platforms.

This is a network of sensors throughout the ship, combined with a central computer. The AI net replaces crew and is combat hardened so more difficult to damage than standard AIs. A neural net wired into the hull of the ship. It does the job of 15 crew (60 crew factors). These are only operational when installed on ships. They do not count on starbases, ground parties and platforms.

This is a network of sensors throughout the ship, combined with a central computer. The AI net replaces crew and is combat hardened so more difficult to damage than standard AIs. These are only operational when installed on ships. They do not count on starbases, ground parties and platforms.

TechManual.value: A small armour plated portable room.
A larger armour plated portable room.
A heavily armour plated portable room.

items.TechManual: This is little more than brakes and cover for the dropped items. The items can be dropped into a position on a planetary surface without landing. The position can even be locked in combat. There are restriction to the mass that can be dropped.

This allows a ship to use the stargate from Forlorn Hope to Valhalla. An exit visa is a similar item to a stargate key. It has unstable allotropes that decay upon activation. As a consequence they have only a single use.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

Used to enter a specific stargate by creating subspace activation harmonics. These are based on the resonance of unique exotic molecular lattices. Key production processes involve nuclear bombardment of the raw materials in order to form exotic atomic structures. The by-products have no commercial value.

This allows a ship to use the stargate from Noctollis Hope to Twinkle. An exit visa is a similar item to a stargate key. It has unstable allotropes that decay upon activation. As a consequence they have only a single use.

Command complex acts as mess halls, utility spare parts producer, conference hall, short term storage, barracks for officers and generally everything that is not specially accounted for by the other complexes. They are needed for 100% efficiency at a rate of 1 per 100 complexes (total complexes rounded up). Finally the weak ISR field generated by the command complex will vastly reduce the effects of a nuclear strike.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement but do count towards total complexes for the above.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Factories are used to produce items as per the rulebook.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Mines are assigned to deposits as per the rulebook. There are many types of mines each suited to a specific technique. They all however are classified as mine for simplicities sake.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Resource complexes are assigned to a specific resource as per the rule book.

Exchange complexes convert one item into another. The specfics are detailed in the rules (in starbase section).
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Research complexes are assigned to a specific project as per the rule book.

A very big and well protected room.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Domes cover parts or all of a starbase, protecting it from planetary environment.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. As per the rulebook, the quantity determines effectiveness of complexes. Orbital docks move ships from orbit to the starport and vice versa. Each orbital dock can support 25 hulls. Therefore a 100 hull ship will require 4 orbital docks to be active.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. They are used to recruit or train natives of a world as general troops. Population determines races available.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. They are used to recruit or train natives of a world as employees. Population determines races available. Note that natives cannot be trained through recruitment complexes. They simply do not have the technological background. The percentage of natives on the world will however contribute to the recruitment amounts, thereby reducing the number of employees recruited.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. The quantity per starbase mass determines the chance of spotting and neutralising diseases.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. The quantity per population and mass determine the overall security of the starbase.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. These assemble hulls to produce ships as per the rule book.
You can have as many ships in production as you like, but the number of hulls added to any single ships per week is
hull production limit = 2 * sqrt(hulls);
Where (hulls) is the size of the ship being built. e.g. 100 hull ship in 5 weeks 150 hull ship in 7 weeks etc.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Ships use them to Maintain, Refit and Repair as per the rule book. 1 complex will increase integrity by a maximum of 10% and reduce damage by 200mu per visit. A repair visit will also recharge the ship's shields.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. These are used to transport items to and from other locations as per the rule book. Each shuttleport can move 1000mu's per week. Agents closing a shuttleport will reduce the remaining capacity by the percentage they contribute.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. A hiport is constructed from fine carbon-60 polymers. These form a lighter than air 'rope' that is anchored to the world and stretches into orbit. Lifts are attached to the line and run up and down between the orbit and the starbase. This is used to allow positions in orbit to transfer items to and from a starbase.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. This is needed to effectively control emplacements.
1 complex will effectively allow 100 hulls to run at 100% of its crew factors. Therefore a 1000 hull platform will require 10 complexes. Only the total hulls is used so two platforms of 50 and 150 hulls respectively will require 2 platforms.
Uncontrolled platforms, i.e. those without a controlling starbase or those linked to a starbase with no platform control complexes will have only 20% of their normal crew factors.
In all cases excess crew factors can compensate for lack of platform control complexes.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. These are used to train mercenaries into specialised troops. Blueprints available limit choices.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. These alter the ecology of the planet, reducing the ratio of domes per complex over time. Terraforming complexes use a number of techniques to stabilise a planetary atmosphere, making it suitable to breathe. They use various strains of genetically engineered bacteria to remove unwanted gases or produce more of a certain gas. They use enzymes and inorganic catalysts to increase natural reactions. They can also spin huge polymer shield reflectors or produce dust clouds in the stratosphere to change light levels. Generally speaking though completion of terraforming will only make a planet habitable for a century or so unless a planet was already in the process of becoming breathable.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

These hide the starbase from orbital scans and give some measure of protection. Should they be destroyed, they have a tendancy to collapse on whatever was within them. Many worlds have geology which is incompatible with cave excavation preventing their construction.
Domes, caves, command, mines, hiports, orbital docks, terraforming and bunkers do not count towards enclosed space requirement.

Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Teleport complexes are very similar to shuttle ports in their function, but utilise advanced ISR technology. They create a field so that they can transport a localised volume through space to arrive at the complex. As this is not an exact science due to quantum uncertainties and nodal decay they cannot be used to export items only import them. They have two primary advantages; the first is that they can be used to import items from any other undocked position within the same system. The second is that they can be used to import items even if the starbase or outpost is currently locked in combat. They cannot however pick up items from another position if that is itself locked in combat.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. Visiting positions can make use of these facilities to boost morale and therefore efficiency.
Complexes are basically a collection of prepared and secured modules that have been specialised. These are used to act as trade centres for the world population. This produces a revenue.
Industrial turbines are used to power the field generators in order to bolster normal shields.
Little more than a few structural modules covering a lot of hardcore and space.

A collector is little more than a vast stellar energy collector. This can extend up to millions of square kilometres of dark fibres, all designed to channel the energy into the base where it is used to generate antiparticles. A free special action is needed before the first is built for the GM to approve their construction.
These devices use high-tech engineering to isolate naturally occurring antileptons and channel them into storage containers. The source may be natural background radiation or cosmic rays.
A dock, when installed on a ship increases its cargo space for the purpose of docking ships and platforms only.

Docked ships can use them to Maintain, Refit and Repair. 1 maintenance bay will increase integrity by a maximum of 10% and reduce damage by 200mu per visit. Patches are required for this - they will be removed from cargo. A repair visit will also recharge the ship's shields.
While it functions as a normal though larger jump engine, the benefit is that it can be supercharged, using 10mu of antimatter. This reduces the jump time by 50%.
These are used as ammunition for the space battle missile launcher.
These are used as ammunition for the space battle missile launcher.

These are used as ammunition for the space battle missile launcher. They are faster than normal missiles and rely on this to produce energy for the explosion. Higher mk versions are more resilient to point defence by being both faster and more heavily armoured.

These are used as ammunition for the space battle missile launcher. They are faster than normal missiles and rely on this to produce energy for the explosion. Higher mk versions are more resilient to point defence by being both faster and more heavily armoured.

The standard torpedo is self propelled and is capable of tracking its target in order to inflict considerable amounts of damage. It is not effected by scintillators. While torpedoes can be launched from a stationary position against another stationary position, they are designed to launch from a moving position. As such they suffer greatly (-12 ACC) if launched against targets that have a 1g-acceleration advantage. As tractor beam cannot reduce 'jitter' in a target, even one that is pinned through the use of tractor beams still counts its combat speed for the purposes of torpedoes. Its sheer size means that it requires a lot more korondite in order to evade detection.

These are used as ammunition for the space battle missile launcher. They are faster than normal missiles and rely on this to produce energy for the explosion. The cloaked version uses korondite technology to evade point defence.

This is a standard missile launcher that has been modified to also fire a WoMD. The changes to the launcher are unsubtle and leave no doubt that it has been designed to launch a weapon capable of killing millions of people. The launcher can still be used to fire standard missiles but many factions consider having these fitted as grounds for posting.

If they strike a target without an ISR field they will deliver 100,000 damage.
Nuclear missiles need to be fired from modified versions of launchers - WOMD Launcher (2050). The changes to the launcher are unsubtle and leave no doubt that it has been designed to launch a weapon capable of killing millions of people. The launcher can still be used to fire standard missiles but many factions consider having these fitted as grounds for posting.

TechManual.value: Stealth fighters use sensor absorbing technology.

items.TechManual: Rocket boosters are activated to give a rapid boost of speed that allows a ship to leave combat. They are used when fleeing during combat or while trying to escape combat during a normal turn. They increase the combat speed of the ship which may reduce the number of between rounds fire suffered by the ship leaving combat.
These can be installed within ships to give cover for defending troops by sealing sections of the ship. They unfortunately have to be installed to work.
As the name suggests these are partially beyond the hull of the ship, making them vulnerable to incoming fire.

Cargo nets are used by boarding craft to tow their recovered loot back from their targets. They are essentially a large jacium reenforced wire net strapped to the boarding craft. They are not suitable for long term use on ships.
These units provide limited life support necessary for troops while they are in a boarding craft approaching their target. They are not suitable to fit in a normal ship.

The boarding craft is a very basic form of transport that is used to allow troops to board or raid other ships.
Approach Speed: 7.0 g Cargo: 500mu Troop Support: 100 Armour: 120

The heavy boarding craft is a very basic form of transport that is used to allow troops to board or raid other ships. The heavy craft is faster than the standard one and carries more troops but only returns the same cargo.
Approach Speed: 9 g Cargo: 500mu Troop Support: 200 Armour: 120

The raiding craft is a very basic form of transport that is used to allow troops to board or raid other ships. The raidng craft is slow but carries more troops and cargo than a standard one. It is ideal for looting slow enemy freighters.
Approach Speed: 4.4 g Cargo: 1000mu Troop Support: 200 Armour: 120

This is the most basic form of survey equipment. It is used to determine if a mining deposit can be deep core mined. A low level survey of the deposit can be done via the prospect order and the equipment is undamage in the process.
A full survey of a deposit to determine the full extent of any deep core material is doen via the 'Deep Core Survey' order and expends the survey rig.
Better quality survey rigs produce better results.

This is the most basic form of survey equipment. It is used to determine if a mining deposit can be deep core mined. A low level survey of the deposit can be done via the prospect order and the equipment is undamage in the process.
A full survey of a deposit to determine the full extent of any deep core material is doen via the 'Deep Core Survey' order and expends the survey rig.
Better quality survey rigs produce better results.

This is the most basic form of survey equipment. It is used to determine if a mining deposit can be deep core mined. A low level survey of the deposit can be done via the prospect order and the equipment is undamage in the process.
A full survey of a deposit to determine the full extent of any deep core material is doen via the 'Deep Core Survey' order and expends the survey rig.
Better quality survey rigs produce better results.

Antimatter is very explosive when it comes into contact with matter and must be contained in magnetic bottles. An antimatter missile contains a number of grains of the substance that react with matter when the containment is broken. If the target is not covered by an ISR field it will deliver 100 strikes at 500 damage instead of 1.

An orbital probe is launched into orbit. It performs a standard scan as though the position itself had entered orbit. As this is a one use item it performs much better mass:mass as a standard sensor due lack of tolerances and critical thresholds in the design.

Platform hulls do not need to perform as many functions as those destined to be incorporated into ships. As such they can be designed to contain a larger volume. Organic platform hulls have a higher internal volume than standard platform hulls as they utilise the waste of the inhabitants. This however makes them weaker. These generate 10 deflector factors per platform hull.
This unit can be programmed to deliver a batch of nanites into the atmosphere of world in order to scrub or liberate a specific gas or counter specific existing nanites.
Normally used to offset increased infrastructure costs due to high gravity.

Used as part of larger structures in order to process ores.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of larger devices in order to excavate ore.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of larger structures in order to process biological substances.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of larger structures in order to isolate potentially dangerous bio-samples - including lifeforms.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used to reinforce larger structures.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of larger structures in order to allow for external interfacing without compromising the interior.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of a larger structure in order to process and effeciently store bulk goods, i.e. goods that are not in cargo containers.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Used as part of a larger structure, the admin quarters are used for interviews and quality assessment as well as basic administration.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Combining the latest VR software and traditional forms of entertainment, the rec unit consumes quite a lot of power and needs quite a lot of sound insulation and recycling. Urinals do not link directly back to bar pumps despite some conspiracy theories.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

Engineering stations contain the necessary equipment to perform work not normally done off-world.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

These have specialist databases and their own localised slave sensor in order to perform short distance scanning.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.

This contains a number of specialist devices to capture/pick/refine flora and fauna resources in preparation for storage.
A module is a device that has no use on its own but when combined with other modular devices becomes a functioning item.
Generally used exhaustively to study bacterium found in atmospheres.
Sometimes used exhaustively to allow exploitation within an extreme environment associated with volcanic activity.
This is generally used to develop refining techniques to exploit an atmospheric compound. Normally it will be used to set a resource weekly change.

Used to give knowledge of the lay of specific strata within a region. This is generally exhausted in response to a specific special action. It can be exhausted to alter a deposit, increasing the stockpile through identifying outlying veins. The drawback is that drilling these sites damages surface veins causing a reduction in yield. This can often be beneficial where a deposit is a few sectors from the base.

Old item - pre infrastructure - contact GM for new item information.
This can be exhausted to modify the local gravity field over an inhabited sector of a world - adjusting the gravity field. This does not effect more than a hundred metres above the sector but is sufficient to improve living standards in high G worlds. For a planet only cultivated and urban sectors need be counted for the improvement (tractor beams are used in isolated areas). Exhaustive use of 1BP (per point over 1) and a net consisting of 25mu celesium and 25mu collidium per sector is required to get the uplift. Building more urban and cultivated sectors requires the grid to be extended.
This allows research techniques for ships up to 50 hulls. Research into Medium and Huge Sized Ships without this Principle is undertaken at a penalty.
This allows research techniques for ships up to 100 hulls. Research into Large and Huge Sized Ships without this Principle is undertaken at a penalty.

TechManual.value: This allows research techniques for ships up to 150 hulls.

items.TechManual: This allows research techniques for ships up to 200 hulls. Research into Galactic Sized Ships without this Principle is undertaken at a penalty.

TechManual.value: This allows research techniques for ships up to 250 hulls.
This allows research techniques for ships up to 300 hulls

items.TechManual: The Principle deals with the utilization of materials in order to generate maximum volume while still maintaining integrity. It pushes the very limits of every known material. This Principle is generally needed for research into Techniques where volume is the only concern.

The Principle deals with the utilization of materials in order to enclose large volumes or support structures with only minumum sacrifice of integrity. This Principle is generally needed for research into Techniques where volume is the primary concern.

This Principle deals with the utilization of materials to the best of their capability. Every known mineral is allocated hundreds of values to ensure that the best mineral or compound is incorporated during specific Technique research.

The Principle deals with the utilization of materials in order to build tough and secure frameworks. Volume is often sacrificed as a necessity. This Principle is generally needed for research into Techniques where safety and security are the primary concerns.

This is the first rung on the ladder of understanding subspace mechanics and well as opening the field to applicable uses of quantum mechanics. The principle also covers fields and thier applications to subjects such as linear acceleration and inertia.

This principle deals with the understanding of the realationship between matter and energy as well as opening the way to control of energy fields. The principle also covers the fundamental concept of interia. Applications include the temporary influence of inertia and the manipulation of inertial frames of reference.

This principle explores the realisation that one region is space is linked to all others and through this theory and the application of energy wave functions mass and be integrated into into spatial functions in order to relocate it in a new position.
This principle explores the exotic particle graviton (not to be mistaken with the mineral gravitron) and theories regarding superstring in the context of subspace and normal space.

This is the science of universal creation. The formation of pocket universes and the manipulation of physical constants within a localised region of space. From this artificial wormholes can be created, stars changed into black holes or naked singularities.
This is the study of the unique properties of lattices within crystals. Techs branching from this basic understanding apply the theories to more pragmatic uses.

Molecular lattices are are not only studied by theoretical models are produced to show how they can be manipulated and intergrated. This is the theoretical first step in macro-molecules and their effects.
This is the basic understanding of alloys and the properties of metallic compounds and the unique chemical, electrical and field affected properties these possess.
This covers theoretical alloys and their potential uses as well as the basis for handling and production of the alloys.

This covers a number of theoretical uses and applications of combining crystal and lattice functions with super-alloys in order to enhance both or push one area further than could be achieved by one field alone.
This covers the theories behind antimatter, its formation both naturally and artificially and some basic undertanding of what could be achieved with the substance.
This covers everything from gravitational collapse of stars down to theoretical artifical manipulation of localised fields in order to produce super-dense material.

This is the study of energy in all its theoretical forms, both from quantum level vacuum energy through to manipulation of elements through radiation and destabilisation of atomic structure. Techs branching off this field use the esoteric knowledge for more practical applications.
This is the study of energy absorption through material means. It specifically looks at trigger thresholds and energy wells within certain materials and how these are formed and manipulated.
This is the theory which unifies the electromagnetic, strong, and weak forces. It looks at how these can be interwined or superceded at a purely laboratory level.

This is the study of interactions and manipulation at a quantum level. This is primarily concerned with observation and establishing reliable procedures to conduct the study. It is the basis for specific technologies that deal with objects at this size and distance.
The understanding of a broad range of specific biological principles.

This is the understanding of all things alien including evolution of biological processes, intelligence, psycology and sociology. Where cultures have developed beyond the primitive stages, more advanced specialist principles have naturally developed. These fall into the categories of socio-political manipulation.

In a universe where the differences between two sentient species can be as great as those between a horse and a jellyfish, certain structures and items need to take the physiological differences into consideration. These can be anything from basic life supports and sanitary facilities through to physiological limits and neural interfaces. Without understanding these, research into certain Techniques will be considerably harder. This can only be researched on a world with a significant population of the appropriate species.

Name.value: Racial Design - State of the Art Human

In a universe where the differences between two sentient species can be as great as those between a horse and a jellyfish, certain structures and items need to take the physiological differences into consideration. These can be anything from basic life supports and sanitary facilities through to physiological limits and neural interfaces. Without understanding these, research into certain Techniques will be considerably harder. This can only be researched on a world with a significant population of the appropriate species.

This principle is often used exhaustively to change the way a population thinks or acts. If it is used on the same planet it was researched on its effect is immediate, otherwise it can only be used once it is tooled up. Example: Human manipulation might be used on a Confederate aligned world with a majority human population captured by the dewiek. This will enable the dewiek to pacify the humans to the point where merchandising is possible. 1 exhaustive use of the principle is normally enough to convert 5 million people.

Required to research blueprints into all standard photon weapons.
Required to research blueprints into all standard photon weapons mkII.

TechManual.value: Required to research blueprints into all standard photon guns.
Required to research blueprints into all standard photon guns.

items.TechManual: This covers a number of unusual mining and refining techniques any one of which may need to be applied to a specific location in order to tap a resource. These techniques are not needed for standard mining but are more suited resource complexes producing minerals under extreme conditions. Specific blueprints for the resource have to be researched individually.

This covers a wide range of technologies dealing with methods of tapping natural resources of a biological nature that are generally not necessary for standard exploitation through resource complexes.
This covers the use of neural mapping in order to perfect memory implants and rapid training downloads. From this specialist training techniques can be developed in order to produce instant troops.
This covers the use of neural mapping in order to perfect memory implants and rapid training downloads. From this specialist training techniques can be developed in order to produce instant troops.

In order to build a specific stargate, the technique has to be combined with stellar cartography for the specific system.

This is the basis for the manufacturing of stargate keys. This is only half the story. In order to get a gate to open, intimate knowledge of the local area of space is required. This is covered by stellar cartography for the specific system.

TechManual.value: This is the study of gravitron and its behaviour.

items.TechManual: This technique can be used by a starbase built on a sea or shallows sector to submerge it. It has to be tooled-up and requires a special action to initiate. The tech will be removed and the starbase will have 150 cave complexes added. Only one can be used per starbase (it will be noted in the GM entry on the position).

This covers methods of altering emf emissions in such a way so as to appear as background noise. The main problem is to achieve these ends without scrambling incoming emf. Different aspects of the technique are applied to varying circumstances.
Unlike emf damping this technique covers specific counter measures to remain unobserved. This includes methods of spatial manipulation and technologies associated with the term 'Cloaking'.

This is the combination of nano-technologies and neural mapping with self learning routines. The result is an artificial intelligence that is truly alien in nature. Techniques also cover the impression of knowledge downloads and subservience protocols.

This is the underlying tech that is required in conjunction with specific branches of the technology for the development of compartments installable into ships and capable of performing tasks similar to those done by complexes. Branching techs supported by this tech are: Engineering, Exploration, Mining and Personnel.

Was previously called Ship Maintenance Bays, but has been updated to Ship Engineering Bays to avoid confusion with the blueprint of a similar name. This is the underlying technology supporting Maintenance Bays.
This is the underlying technology supporting Resource Extraction Bays.

TechManual.value: This is the underlying technology supporting Strip Mining Bays.

items.TechManual: This is the underlying technology supporting Mercenary and Employee Recruitment Bays.
This covers a broad range of techniques used in the specific design of hulls for gnerally merchant class ships. The primary concern is space at the cost of structural integrity.
This covers a broad range of techniques used in the specific design of hulls for gnerally merchant class ships. The primary concern is space at the cost of structural integrity.
This covers a broad range of techniques used in the specific design of hulls for warships or exploration vessels The primary concern is structural ingety at the cost of space.
This covers a broad range of techniques used in the specific design of hulls for warships or exploration vessels The primary concern is structural ingety at the cost of space.
This technique covers the growing of biological material that is resilient to both cosmic radiation and the colds of space.
This is the art of growing lattice structues such that a single molecule
This technique covers high spec constructions such as bunkers, bunks, battle bridges. These are generally items that require a lot of thorlium.
This covers improvements in thorlium technology. Ablative/plate armour mkII combined with low density materials tech for light armour.
This technology specifically shapes and guides research towards combat uses. This is generally only needed where the uses of originating science are not obvious.

Name.value: Holy Scriptures of the True One

items.TechManual: Detailed belief system apperataining to an entire way of life for followers of the True One. This technique has cultural restrictions on its research.
The combination of three principles has allowed research into explosive compounds to reach dizzying new heights.

TechManual.value: The addition of anti-matter to the equation of big bangs.

items.TechManual: The application of organic sciences to warfare has produced a field that covers everything from neuro-toxins and plagues. This tech is primarily concerned with the techniques used to produce and handle biological and chemical agents. Despite the name, some beneficial sciences have evolved from this tech.
The tech covers the use of hyper stimulation of base organic materials in order to maximise mitosis. The product produces various slabs of fleshy material.
More advanced techniques allow for both faster growth and repression of mutations.
This covers the use of amorphouse nanites to seek weaknesses and fuse themselves to the location.
The use of advanced nanites to perform the task of identification of possible fractures and to repair them.
Manipulation of emf and electromagnetic waves and they application of specific technologies.
Advanced use of linear accelerators to project masses. This is more in line with wave technology than pure energy.
Inerital manipulation allows for even more rapid acceleration of materials along the barrel.
This covers the induced alteration the quantum states of electrons allowing for hyper compression of gases to a degeneracy.
The techniques identifies and utilizes natural and artificial means of creating anti-particles. These techniques cover a broad range of high energy mechanics.

TechManual.value: This is the study of zionite and its peculiar properties.

items.TechManual: The inclusion of grand unified theory to the work pioneered in spatial manipulation is enough to allow matter to be transported through subspace although this is still relatively unrefined.

TechManual.value: Safeguards a base from quakes. Has to be tooled to be effective.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

items.TechManual: This is an esoteric tech that underpins specialist blueprints that deal with the education of civilians. It may also be exhausted where indicated to improve the general level of academia within a civilian group.
This covers the esoteric technology and development of a planetary wide media service. This includes code of conduct for advertising, basis of software protocols for networks and related systems.

TechManual.value: Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.
Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

items.TechManual: This covers a number of techniques designed to make land fertile or suitable for plants. This includes irrigation, drainage, soil improvments, steppes design. It is generally used in conjunction with appropriate items such as flora, fauna and/or modules. Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

TechManual.value: Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

items.TechManual: Covers a range of equipment designed to make like more bearable on arctic worlds. This covers things such as better thermal insulations, geo-thermal pylons (where possible), means of adapting vehicles for low temperature use to list just a few. Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

This covers the basic requirements for successful civilian colonisation. It is generally not needed on a planet that has flourishing ecology that is already suited to colonisation but would benefit a planet on the edge of habitability. Used as part of infrastructure integration on populated worlds.

TechManual.value: Required to upgrade stage 1 colony to stage 2.
Required to upgrade stage 2 colony to stage 3.

items.TechManual: When integrated into a world as an infrastructure upgrade this item will grant up to 25,000 water terraforming points for the purpose of terraforming sectors.
Generally used to counter the effects of a hostile atmosphere. Needs to be tooled in the base.
The terrestial equivalent to oceanography. This gives and understanding of the continental crusts and plate tectonics that form the rock surface of a world.

A tooled copy of this indicates that the base now has access to many specific parameters of the system's star that are not normally required. This basic level of knowledge is generally esoteric and confined to civilian organisations as it has no practical applications and as such does not appear on the research tree supported by a specific principle.
This can only be started as free special action. If conducted in a system with a stargate a bonus of 2000mu can be claimed at the time of the special action towards the project.
This can only be started as free special action. If conducted in a system with a stargate a bonus of 2000mu can be claimed at the time of the special action towards the project.

Stellar Cartography is not merely observation but the use of subspace mechanics to plot hidden masses and gravitational folds. This includes stargate connections calculations necessary to the production of keys. The technique is also used as a basis for discovering new systems, i.e. those not flagged as common.

TechManual.value: Up to 25 hulls of any type. No race specific.
Up to 50 xlight hulls, any material.
Up to 50 light hulls any material.
Needed for ships with up to 50 standard hulls of any material.
Up to 50 heavy hulls of any material.
51 to 75 light metal hulls.
51 to 75 heavy metal hulls.
51-75 standard metal hulls.

items.TechManual: This prototype blueprint is normally exhaustively used to tap a specific amount of mineral under unusual conditions. It can be used exhaustively to concentrate on extracting the best reserves of a deposit on a small area. It is a slow process that caused minimal environmental disruption.

This prototype blueprint is normally exhaustively used to tap a specific amount of an organism under unusual conditions. It is sometimes used to restock a depleted resource or enhance a poor one. It is only used as through its specific requirement as determined by a special action.
Knowledge of energetics and crystalline lattices through energetic compounds tech are required to determine methods of vaporising korondite without it decaying into base elements.
This blueprint covers the creation of degenete matter and the construction of storage vessels for the containment of degenerate matter.
The blueprint covers the safe creation and construction of storage vessels for antimatter.

TechManual.value: Organic hulls cannot go past this type.

items.TechManual: This incorporates the use of living quarters with basic armour technology.
Super cooling to almost absolute zero pushes the technology to the quantum limit of resolution.

Actually this is a full body sheath that changes the colour of the skin and hair in order to change the basic appearance of the operative. It does not dramatically change apparent physical attributes. It can be used to blend against shadows or take on the appearance of a generic humanoid.

TechManual.value: Ship=351,Sabre Tooth Snarl,150,80,262,450,25351
Ship=400,Patrol Cruiser,75,70,0,450,25400

Ship=760,Yacht,10,80,0,0,25760 ShipItem=2,131 ShipItem=1,134 ShipItem=3,160 ShipItem=5,103 ShipItem=1,102 ShipItem=1,140 ShipItem=1,176

The guilder is hard currency (and therefore of negligible mass). It has the equivalent base value of 1 stellar though cannot be used directly to pay personnel due to them not using the money in the place they work. Guilders are therefore treated as per other trade goods. The guilder (or its equivalent) is often paid directly to star captains by civilians for either services or goods. They also have use for developing planetary infrastructure beyond initial colonisation by bolstering fledgling economies.
This is blood money it may be paid by civilians as compensation. Indentured workers for example may pay it to buy their freedom.

This is local currency that is recognised by the EEM (and other monetary authorities) as originating from an illegal or banned source. Sales to planetary economies are entirely possible as per normal trade goods.

This covers a number of negligible-mass items exchanged with natives. These sorts of items are often used by natives for bartering. They may be unpolished gemstones, stamped or tooled precious metals, drilled beads and other knickknacks that have a reasonable trade value but can never be mass produced or exploited through resource complexes.

Represents shares in EEM regulated and own civilian companies. They are classed as stable form of portable currency that generally fall into the middle trade band when selling to civilian populations.

Alien cattle are used for everything from clothing through to foodstuffs. Getting these products though is the domain of the civilian. All a starbase is concerned with is the storing and transportation of the cattle from one world to another. These are worth slightly more than animals and livestock.
As these do not enhance the economy of a world, they are classed as living trade goods. Trade in pleasure slaves is often considered immoral.
This is made from the fermentation of grains and fruits rather than industrially produced directly from hydrocarbons. It can be stored for much longer than normal food.

These cover a range of dishes that are produced and consumed throughout Yank. They are made from traditional Kastorian recipes and while they may not be many people's favourite dish, their scarcity outside Yank is sufficient to warrant their sale in distant peripheries.
Exquisite delicasies that for one reason or another cannot be effectively preserved.
The scamp could be eaten but their main attraction is their furry skin, which comes in all different shades of brown.
This covers a range of items unique to the planet Masada. The use local woods found only on this world. They are also produced using traditional skills.

TechManual.value: These furs are from the creature found in the plains of Dogleg.

items.TechManual: Rare slices of preserved meats from the creatures found in the bog lands of Dogleg.

These are small rodents that dwell in the jungles. They breed in the wild and are viewed as an excellent self-sustaining source of food by civilians although they only last for a few generations beyond their homeworld before becoming infertile.
These are little more than strips of cloth and small hand polished beeds. Each set comes with literature explaining the native customs of the Sea Folk that hand made these items.
The fragance is produced from the finest lilies of this world. Different batches will each have a slightly different smell.

It is the seeds within the pods attached to the reeds that are used. These are only removed at the time of use. While they do not last indefinitely, once either the pods are removed from the reeds or the seeds from the pods, the seeds start to decay quite rapidly. They are a powerful spice and are used sparingly.

The seeds grow in sheltered spots on the Dew Tree. When fully mature they are around 2cm across and have a hard shell which protects the seed from animals and bad weather. When this coat is removed, you find a crunchy nut which is excellent as a between meal snack.
Only a specific part of the hide proves to be suitable for the production of clothing.
This covers a number of creatures that are normally bred for meat, hides and lactose. They come in all colours, shapes and sizes. They are worth more than common livestock but less than cattle.
Small skins taken from a wriggling worm analogue. It can be used to produce high quality accessories.
This delicate fragrance is produced from the rare jasmine flowers found mountain valleys of Lantern. Only the most potent flowers collected in a single day can be used.
The colourful hides from these creatures are desired across the galaxy for the superior clothing that can be produced from them.
This is a range of silverware that have a unique style pioneered here on this world. They also incorporate a number of naturally occuring semi-precious stones found only in abundance on this world.

This is catch all name for low value bulk foodstuffs that form staple diets of most civilians. It is often yeast based or produced from widely available plants. 1mu of food is sufficient to feed approximately 30 people for a week.

This is the trade name of a medicinal drug that is extracted from a unique creature capable or regenerating even its nervous system. It is however only suitable for the removal of scar tissue and rapid healing lesions.
Drained from the sap of the giant trees, this delicate sweet taste is best sampled when fresh.
The drug give the feeling of immortality and capability rivalling that of a god. The feeling of complete power and knowledge is temporary and does not have any real benefits.
This potent drug comes in small vials with a picture of a stylised toad with a blissful smile on its face.
One of the mose mouth watering succulent fish ever discovered in the peripheries. There are books being written solely on this subject.
These are stripped from the small kangaroo analogues that are native to the world.

These are little more than basic items that are produced and sold to civilian populations. They are more commonly produced through the use of special resource complexes than in factories due to their low value.

This item includes a variety of unique goods that cannot be made in a factory. It includes, gourmet food, art, precious stones, perfume, furs, etc. These items can only be produced using a Special Complex to exploit the natural resources of a world.

Both the stem and the flowers are eaten although the tough fibres from older growth are often removed during preparation. The remarkable vines have dietary benefits as well. They are known to aid in the recovery of mild peptic disorders.
These are polished rocks of interstellar matter. The have formed under unique circumstances in a localised region of the universe. This has preserved fantastic crystaline patterns.
The small brightly coloured bird analogue survived the catastrophe on its homeworld. It has a shrill whistle that can be trained to mimic tunes.

This covers a range of naturally occuring drugs that have an effect on the mind of the user. Results range from hallucinations, feelings of paranoia or empathy through to out-of-body experiences depending on the species and the amount used.

Heaven herb is the generic name of the a number seperate plants that when taken internally produce a mildly euphoric effect. They have a near zero addiction factor that can easily be countered through the use of modern medicine.

Alien plantlife covers a group of plants that are highly adaptable to extreme environments. They can be seeded on worlds that have either no or very little life in order to establish vegetation in regions that currently have none. Normally 1,000mu's of alien plantlife is required in order to convert a flat lifeless terrain into a vegetation terrain. Alien plantlife can only be used on a world that has a breathable atmosphere. Multiple sectors can be seeded in a single special action although the GM is the final arbitrator on what will be effective.
Small silvery aquatic creatures. These have an almost overpowering taste and as such are used sparingly, generally to accompany other spicy dishes.
Chichester blue is a mineral found only on this world. It is a delicate rock that can be facetted, allowing it to be used in jewellery.
Small birds with dull plumage but with a surprising turn of speed on the ground. They are fit only for hunting.
These strips of dried meat are in fact the desiccated husks shed from the alien and normally used as nutrients by the sentien species in the next stage of egg development.

If the extensive use of plants mixed with dubious bodily excretions appeals then these native cures as produced by the falconians is just your thing. This latest batch has been screened against the plagues that accompanied the original products.
These are large fast land animals that are hunted by the native nobility of the Falconia. They are only slaughtered at the time of eating.

These are small gloriously plumed bird anologues that share a common ancestry with the falconians. They need to eat their body weight in syrupy liquids everyday. The do not do well in captivity and tend to die for no apparent reason.
This is the wool taken from a number of quadrupeds native to the forests of Falconia. This resource is normally only exploitable through contract with the natives.

These small translucent fish are capable of causing startling patterns by both the reflection of light along scales and the rapid disturbance of the surface of the water. These make them captivating pets.

What is art? In the Peripheries the term includes native carved tree roots, died animal skins, traditional canvas paintings, and a hundred other categories. Anything that is desired for it asthetic qualities, rather than its intrinsic worth, falls into this category. Art cannot be manufactured but it can be exploited using special complexes on planets where the natives are particularly creative. These are generic ones, i.e. there is no indication where they originated.
Cyprian wines are produced from a bacterial strain found nowhere else in the universe. While the wines may not be the best in the galaxy they are cheap and plentiful and can last for years.
The eggs can remain preserved in sand for decades at a time and as such, if stores with only the minimum of care they will remain preserved until used.
These are named after the scarab beetles of Earth on account of the jewelled shells and general appearence. They feed on virtually anything.

These are cut from giant insects that have a passing resemblence of flying dinosaurs of Earth's history. The meat can only be eaten if carefully preserved. It has become a firm favourite amongst the naplians.

These are formed from ancient geological rock taken from a few secret locations. Their price is a reflection on the relative scarcity of the rock and the finite supply. There are some outraged citizens that believe the rock should never be quarried in the first place.
These grow in bunchies close to the surface of the water. They are fairly common in the swamps although cultivation is difficult on account of the large quantities of life forms that feed on them.
These are small semi-aquatic creatures that produce surprisingly musical mating calls.
This is the street name for a drug that has similar properties to the widely avalilable apotheosis.
This delicate fragrance is made from a moss as it quickly dies. The smell unfortunately quickly degrades as well making shipment a priority.

These are harvested from the huge floating reeds that can cover a thousand square kilometers of ocean. Only the youngest shoots are used.
(If known, see also restricted item 30948).
Istrian coral actually covers both the corals produced from large reefs and the gloriously coloured shells from the giant molluscs that live on the reefs.
These small plants look most peculiar, with strange tendrils and sucking vines. They will climb and climb until they eventually wither and die.

This is a very powerful hallucinogen that will completely inhibit all higher functions of the brain. Under medical conditions that is perfect for long term sufferers or those undergoing intensive surgery but when applied to masses has horrendous effects. The reason for this is that motor responses are not shut down without additional drugs, hence reckless uncontrolled behaviour is the result.
These cover a range of fungi analogues that can be found throughout the grasslands. They are a firm favourite amongst the Flagritz, at least amongst those that have tried them.

These are clothes made from the fine scales that the avian creatures have instead of feathers. Their fragility can lead to embarrasing exposure should the wearer be caught in a crowd of pressing bodies.
Crystal silk has all the qualities of traditional silk but with the ability to refract light like a prism. The thread is used on some of the most dramatic clothing to date.
These are the carefully recontructed remains of ancient extinct creatures that once swam the seas of this world but are now little more than bleached bones.
The crystals that are used in the production of the art are taken from rare pools. This scarcity has artificially inflated the price.
These have a similar colour and markings to the old Earth spider, hence the name. They have a unique taste that many find appealing.

TechManual.value: This small vine fruit has many uses, including winemaking.

items.TechManual: Fire jewels are produced from the volcanic regions. They are primarily fire opals although a number of exotic minerals gives some unique qualities.
This is the processed air sac of the aquatic bladder creature. Using too much of this substance results in what is colloquially called being bladdered.
This is made from the addition of the very finest blue stones found on Chichester with native precious metals.
These are formed from the wings of bees after being treated with plastics. The colour is similar to amber.
These are made from the teeth of the aquatic inca beast. The teeth are jet black with a rainbow sheen.
In the wild these avian creatures hunt prey that is normally bigger than themselves. When used on alien worlds, this can lead to some rather disasterously one-sided battles.

TechManual.value: These rather fetching pink shawls are not to everybody's taste.

items.TechManual: This narcotic is mildly poisonous and will kill a long term user through heamoraging. The high though is considered with the risk.
These are the bushy tails taken from the Stan Fox, a distant cousin from those taken from Earth by early pioneers. It is generally used in chic clothing.

These are collected from a unique tree that actually fires spear-like growths at approaching creatures. As such much of the nutrients have come from the bodies of those impaled while trying to reach the unripe fruit. Only after the fruit will the spear hurling stop.

Ground mushrooms, sliced mushrooms, soups, stocks and much more can be achieved from the huge mushrooms. For those native to the planet though, this primary source of food is not unlike gruel. Only on the edge of the universe are people likely to consider it on a par with local luxuries.
This drug is extracted from the secretion sacs of the web footed newt. In large doses it is fatal although a small amount will induce euphoria.
This is pulped and dried moss. It is generally burnt as an incense and breathed in to give a euphoric high.

These are the small water-proof eggs that are deposited in the wadis before they dry. The remain in the dust under rocks and pebbles, shaded from the sun until the next rains. These eggs could be considered a delicacy.

Indigon is a naturally occurring mineral found in only a few places around the peripheries. It has no value in itself, but can be mixed with bexon and corlagalan to produce immortality alpha. This is a rare drug that has excellent morale boosting effects. Indigon cannot be produced commercially.
This is a violent stimulent that is sought after by those wanting to face the 'edge'.

Stimbrew covers a range of narcotics that are generally based on amphetamine although a number of biological sources produce the effects from totally different biochemical reactions. They are often taken to keep awake although this is usually to the detriment of higher functions such as cognitive rationale and social interaction.
This modest plant is generally dried and burnt in order to produce a smoke that can be absorbed through lungs or similar gas permeable membrane. The effects are generally soporific.

TechManual.value: It induces euphoria and is only mildly addictive.

items.TechManual: Boriflor is a mind enhancing drug that gives the user a feeling of 'cosmic awareness'. The effect lasts a short while and is addictive. Boriflor is a natural drug and cannot be produced synthetically. The drug is outlawed in the Inner Empire but generally tolerated in the Peripheries, despite its addictive nature.

This highly addictive substance is Interdicted in the Inner Empire. When used it directly stimulates the pleasure centres of the brain producing an incredibly powerful feeling of euphoria. The drug can only be produced from naturally occurring substances in a special complex. Synthetic production in factories is not possible.

One of the rarer more potent drugs in the galaxy this is banned in the Empire and all subject states due to the will altering effects. These are to increase the libido of any taking it by fantastic amounts in some cases leading to death by exhaustion. Unscrupulous people have been known to use two mu's of the aphrodisiac to convert normal civilians into pleasure slaves.

TechManual.value: This covers a range of edible nuts that have high value.

items.TechManual: These are formed from extensive processing of grass pods. The chemical dyes and esters present have to be distilled before use. Care has to be taken as they have a tendance to mix with certain naturally occuring chemicals and produce unpleasent discolouration. These effects are clearly labelled on the containers.
These are weavings and various other assorted trinkets produced by the artistic natives. Many represent images of their homeworld, no longer accessible to them.
Golden trinkets, precious stones, and similar small personal adornments are all included in this item. It is highly prized for its value, aesthetic beauty, and snob value.

Ecological issues have never been at the forefront of Periphery politics and the fur trade is booming. Exotic skins from many strange alien creatures fetch a reasonable price. Furs cannot be produced artificially.

This is the generic term for a whole range of small cute and fluffy creatures that do not mind being domesticated by civilians. They are treated as a trade good rather than a life form as even though they are alive they do not enhance the economy of the world, merely entertain their owners.
This is taken from the strange aquatic creatures found in the south polar region of the world. It numbs external features without impeding internal activity by not effecting autonomic nervous system.
This is the distilled essence of the moss root. More than million individual grains have to be used just to procure a single dose.

Cosmetics covers a whole range of products where the ingredients are unkown and definitely not indicated on the container. The user should beware that what may be labelled 'Free Spirit' may in fact be the blubber from a deep sea squid-like alien.
This covers a number of rare trees that are exploited for their superior lumber. This is used only to ornamental uses due to its inherent value.
This is an insect repellent that is made from a natural sap. Humans find the smell to be pleasent.

Alcohol has been known since the dawn of time. While it can be coloured and have its flavour enhanced, this type covers the mass produced substance that if freely flowing in recreation complexes. Exotic liquers are generally individually labled and have a unique origin.
This projection is used both of reproduction and consumption. It is not surprising that it has something of a reputation amongst natives the universe over once they are introduced to it.
The creatures have to be transported live. Once at their destination they can then be ground up and used as part of other products such as chemcial apprasives and such. A little goes a long way.
These are taken from the omniverous pack creatures of Stand. They are thick dark furs that are generally used in the making of clothing.
Both the soft pink colour and the delicate fragrance fail to prepare the drinker for power of the alcohol nor the stinging headache of the morning after.
The rainbow beetle shells have to be treated with heat to bring out the full rainbow effect before being incorporated into jewellery. This is more of an art than a technical skill.

As these are made from natural fibres, they cannot be manufactured in factories. They have to be made from specially designed complexes that utilise natural resources. These are invariably special resource complexes. These complexes invariably deal with all aspects of their manufacture from harvesting through to weaving. Common utilitarian clothing is considered a peripheral item and as such has no intrinsic value.

It looks like an extremely bony greyhound dog with triple rows of shark-like teeth. It is vicious and used only for racing and gambling. The bait has to be alive and their ability to learn means that it also has to be caught and devoured.

These are collected from the brightly coloured avain creatures of Kilo. As this process does not actually kill them, it is normal to remove only a few and return the creature to the wild. The feathers are used in the manufacture of extravagant clothing.

These are not generic pharmaceuticals used in hospitals and by investigation teams. These are specially designed drugs that utilise a natural resource that cannot be manufactured in factory complexes. As they are not designed for recreational use they are classed as a trade good rather than drugs.
This is a non-producible drug extracted from rare alien creatures. It is a powerful drug increasing both coordination and motivation with a sense of euphoria. It is not a combat drug.
A close analogue of the more commonly available kinshi, this drug is more potent and as such is more highly prized.

These make use of rare planetary resources such as the tail feathers from a cliff snark or the teeth of a grippohiff. As such they cannot be manufactured. Resource complexes account for all aspects of their manufacture from harvesting through to clothing design.

This is quite possibly the most rare and sought-after substance in the universe. The drug induces a hallucination in which their play out their dreams. A user can experience hundreds of years in a matter of minutes.

TechManual.value: A compound found within the fossils of extinct marine organisms.

items.TechManual:
This covers a range of creatures that have been specifially trained by the mohache to aid low tech farmers.
These can only be trained on the planet Sty due to years of practise.
These are small cheap trinkets produced by locals on the fractured segment of the ring world.
Not just basic fish dishes, but also a complement of various vegetables that grow in the same same location and are used exclusively to enhance this staple meal.
The delicate meat from these crustaceans must be consumed within a short time of capture in order to preserve the taste.
These are the staple diet of the natives of the world. There are more ways of cooking and eating Jestorian fish than recipes for all other aquatic life put together.
These rare minerals are produced in only a few mines. Both the size and colour of the gems are remarkable. They tend to be a cold blue white colour with a hint of green.

The latest memorabilia covering all aspects of the famous Detinus singer Treasure Winters who rose to stardom during the 205 Mohache games. Her blossoming career has so far toured the Detinus worlds but rumour has it she is looking for gigs futher afield.
These have an unusual taste that is not to everyone's palette though does provide a great deal of nutrition.
These are the smaller aquatic life caught by the indigenous fisherfolk of this section using small nets and wooden boats. They have low taste but are plentiful.

This is a mixture of exotic enzymes extracted from the life form in order to produce unique medical supplies. Their primary use is in the selective alteration of metabolic reactions in order to treat both tissue damage and infections.
This is a terraforming plant that when seeded onto a world will remove oxygen. It has a high growth rate and could prove an ecological disaster though withers in atmospheres with less than 5% oxygen.
This covers all manner of wooden objects carved from the massive pine trees of Frey. The use of both hi-tech sawing mills and hand carving allow for rapid production as well as individuality.
These fabrics have startling colours that adapt to light levels, turn deep red under low light and fading to pale green under bright light.
These are composites produced by small aquatic creatures from sand and natural secretions. The result is an amazing brightly sparling shell that is incredibly delicate.
This covers a range of very rare chemicals that cannot be manufactured. As such they are highly prized by indigenous populations for all manner of reasons, most of a dubious persuasion.

This is produced from avian down collected by hand from nesting boxes. It is extremely warm buth also remarbably soft. Cloths are more generally lined with this down although when processed it does produce exceptional material.
These small rodents do not live particularly long and when taken off-world invariably become sterile.

These small creatures bear a resemblence to the ancestors of humans. They have limited intelligence but sufficient to be trained. Their use as pets (quarry in certain alien cultures) is highly prized.

TechManual.value: Small scorpions, many of which have toxic stings.

items.TechManual: This is a thick syrup produced by intelligent insects. It is used as a food substance although must be consumed quickly as it crystalises and breaks down into tasteless dust.
These are made from the careful preservation of the firefly insects. The bright glitter is organic in substance and eventually fades but before it does it is truly amazing.
This is made from the green weeds that are compressed and mixed with clay to give a destinctive green appearence once fired.

TechManual.value: These are unique pieces of jewellery produced only on this world

items.TechManual: These are unique designs that are developed to make the most of the gem stones found on this world.

These are made from brightly coloured head crests from the rodents found on this world. They are used by the males of the species to attact females in the long grass. The plums rise above the grasses and can be easily seen for many kilometers.
These are religious ornaments that always feel warm to the touch and give the holder a destinctive feeling of being watched by a divine father figure.
This substance is believed to even hold the universe together. It is produced from a secret process known only to select naplians.
This wonder drug is used in medical procedures (hence trade good, not drug). It prevents rejection of transplants and other grafts.
These are deep purple but have a few impurities within the crystal structure to give them a unique colour under certain lights and from specific angles.

Holdfast naturally accumulates metals from seawater in nodules. These can be harvested and processed for metals. A large ocean of flourishing holdfast at roughly 280k will have a peak output of Yield = 200, 10% drop = 20 and a growth of 10k.

Slug juice is a very specific chemical formula that can be found within certain organisms. The substance can be produced in the lab, but only under extreme conditions that are simply not viable for mass marketing. While the substance is found on a number of worlds and can even show properties of isomerism, it is found to have the same effects.

TechManual.value: These small colourful creatures are perfect for aquariums.

items.TechManual: It is a drug produced from the hormonal discharge from the pencil fish. As well as increasing libido, it also reduces inhibitions. A favourite with teenagers and male bosses.
This actually covers a range of dishes that utilize the local fish caught in the few rivers on the world. While not the most amazing of foods, it is still found enjoyable by many.

Taken from the unmolested ice fields of the artic circle, this water is guaranteed to contain no harmful additives. It is even naturally sparkling due to the presence of carbon dioxide. Trace exotic minerals are believed to be good for the health.

This is a drink, originally prepared by the naplians it has become a quick hit with many others. As the name implies the drink does in fact contain snake venom although with a liberal amount of antidote. Due to natural decay of the included antidote, the drink must be consumed before the use-by date to avoid poisoning.

Thes originate on the planet Castle. They are the remains of a civilisation of tiny aliens that died out maybe more than a billion years ago. Only the loss of the atmosphere after burial by dust has preserved them.
This covers a number of grains and other seeds that are common to the plants of this world.
