Common Dressler worms breed like flies, feasting on starbase biological effluent. Once treated and cooked however they will provide for the basic nutritional needs. Worlds generally purchase this cheap source of food as a last resort. A special action can be used to slaughter the livestock, converting it into half the mass of standard food (item 30048). On a world that does not require domes, alien livestock can be used to breed more worms. A special action will use 10,000worms as breeding stock to produce more worms.This will effectively set up a resource in the location of the starbase with a yield of 100, a change of 1% and a 10% drop of 1. The 10% drop can be increased by 1 and for every 10,000mu's of worms used to improve the breeding stock. Note that a low pass scan may well detect huge breeding programs even if they do not detect the starbase. Worms are worth less than both cattle and animals.
These cover a vast quantity of foods produced from vegetables by the natives of Harmony.

This is a term used for a collection of small and generally tacky merchandise produced by the dewiek natives of the planet. They are traditional charms, invariably produced from the dried skins and sour smelling musks taken from prey, much loved by the dewiek.

This is the catch-all name for an item that does not have a specifc use or if it does, this is not known to the owner. e.g. The famous Glark-Spandle - possibly a weapon of devastating power or, more likely, a tentacle cleaner.
The horns of the island gazelles have the appearence of being covered in bright gemstones, hence the name. They are highly ornamental.

TechManual.value: This

items.TechManual: The colour of the minerals deposited by the plants and creatures however is still present. It has a range of colours covering the entire spectrum although blue and green appear to be the most common next to white. The coral makes very attractive jewellery.

These are made from the brilliantly silver swords taken from the small fish of the world. The colour is due to the plating of the cartilidge by a layer of 'pearl'. This forms under a layer of flesh which is then scraped off.

While only as effective at blowing chunks out of trespassers, local flora and fauna as standard civilian weaponry, the designs are much more garish with dangerous looking pointy bits. This especially appeals to the krell.

TechManual.value: This small creature has one of the most divine tastes ever.

items.TechManual: The seaweed can be used to transform the atmosphere of other worlds but needs a few basic requirements. First the temperature needs to be temperate (240-320) and there needs to be sea regions present. The last requirement is that there is oxygen, although this cannot be the primary atmospheric component as this weed produces it, not removes it. Gravity does not play a part. It requires 10mu per planetary sector but also needs at least 2 years.

TechManual.value: These are crafted from unique gems found only on this world.

items.TechManual: To affect the ecosystem on another world you would need to deliver 1000 MU's of spores. The spores could only survive in temperatures of 253-323k. All plant based special complex production from mud or swamp terrain would be reduced by 25% after 6 months and by 50% after a year. Other specials might also be affected.
This is formed from the fibrous almost cellulose type fat found in large amounts just below the skin. It is superior to standard animal fats.

This is a medical supply that can be used to increase the osmotic potential of cells. This is useful when treating poisons and other toxins although over use will result in rupture of the cell wall membrane when not used correctly.
These are a deep blue/black with slashes of scarlet and magenta. They are very popular for the inclusion as trimmings for chic clothing.

Cave weed can be used to produce a self sustaining breathable atmosphere on a world which originally had CO2 by converting it into oxygen and liberating nitrogen. The temperature has to be sufficient to allow plant life. Optimum amount is 100mu's per sector (300 per mountains sectors but 0 per sea sector). It normally takes 2 years to convert all CO2 into N2/O2 for a world with 5 optical depth (minimum optical depth for a breathable atmosphere). This is the equivalent to changing 100 atmospheric parts/week.
The meat from this creature is very strong to the point where some would not eat it.
These diamonds contain some rare impurities that given them a peculiar green cast, making them unique to this world.
Mojo is a colloid extracted from plants. As well as boosting natural pheramone production in humanoids, it also stimulates heart rate and blood flow to the skin.
The subterranean young of the putterbeast can be cooked in a myriad of ways and each taste substantially better than the adult.
This is the generic native translation for a whole range of aquatic creatures that form part of the staple diet for the indigenous naplians.
Complete with a label depicting a hanged man proclaiming that this is just what he needed to quench his burning throat!

Ambrosia is a substance that rapidly increases the fertility of a region of arable land and as such is heavily prized by civilians the Peripheries over. While it is theoretically possible to manufacture this substance, as it requires so many different processes to make even a single mu, it has only been economically viable to search for it in the wild.
This art is produced from the multicoloured igneous glass common to the volcanic regions. Only the most skilled use of lathes can carve the stones into fine art.

These are stripped from the monstrous aquatic creatures that plough both the surface and abyssal ocean depths. The creatures appear mammalian although they do not have lungs but a number of gill features along their sides.

This is a generic term for the numerous species of aquatic creatures found in the oceans of the world. They have succulent meat which is prepared in a variety of ways, although generally left plain by the religious factions.
These are found in the greatest abundance in the locale of an oasis. The fruits have tough outer skins but within are rich flesh filled with juice.
This is delicate tender flesh that can be cooked in a variety of ways although flash frying is the most popular.
Natural rare isotopes play an important part of their production during the refining of oily viscous tars and crude oils.
These are various horns, skulls and other assorted bits of dead alien creatures that for one reason or another get hung on civilian walls with pride.

These biochemicals are of considerable commercial use as they rapidly increase reaction rates. They can however only be used in trace amounts so have little benefit to industry. This keeps them firmly in the civilian sector. Even with advanced storage they tend to denature over time.
The hide from the devilcat is as beautiful as the creature is vicious. The fur tends to be valued most highly by primitive societies.
These docile creatures can only slaughtered to provide hides during the first few months before they become too scarred and rough.
The meat of even the youngest tends to be tough but nourishing. Only a few parts of the beast are edible though.
These small creatures are generally female. They are very small, only slightly larger than a finger and are multi coloured although shades of green and brown predominate.
These have a strong bitter taste that is only made palatable through extensive cooking. They are the stable diet of monkey analgues that live on the world.

The brewing process is a secret known only to the refiners of this bitter but potent whisky. Rumours of the use of swamp rat scrotum in the clearing process are denied. It tastes best if left to mature for at least 8 years.
Only the softest furs stripped from the spine are suitable for use. The rest of the carcass is tough and inedible and disposed.
The brocker is a badger analogue, cantankerous and vicious just like its namesake. Its fur however is luxurious.

These are actually a number of species of small brightly coloured creatures that live on the moving sand bars of the world. They spend much of their time basking in the sun and conducting articulate mating dances.
This is a light drug that induces vomiting and other bodily excretions including sweats although also sedates.
This is formed from the inclusion of large molecular proteins within an aquaeous solution. The molecules act as carriers for other drugs allowing them to be processed in specifc manners by digestion.

This oil is extracted from seaweed using drying techniques which result in the plant seeping the oil which drips into waiting trays. The oil is high in various omega complexes and surprisingly healthy.
The gazmi bunnies originate on a world with no obvious predators. This makes them curious in a cute sort of way.
Need to have some vine seeds before research into reproducing them is possible. Starting research is a free special action.

These naturally contain oxygen under high pressure so can explode if hit during combat. As they are designed to grow in unusual conditions they can be grown into vines (30302) using factory production.

These have pods that are filled with oxygen making them explosive if hit. They are seeded onto a planet in order to produce an atmosphere. 1000mu's of vines per sector will produce an atmosphere in 1 year. After a year, they can also be tapped for a resource of vine seeds. The sector used for the seeding will produce 1mu/week seeds per 100mu's seeded. Note that the sector used to seed the vines will be clearly visible by a low pass scan.

This is a highly sought after drug on account of its use as a fertility treatment. It can only be extracted from unusual creatures through resource complexes. Building these normally requires the use of an extraction blueprint (30304).

This is an aquaeous based compound that degrades swiftly if allowed to dry. It stimulate various parts of the brain producing the feeling to tingles and warmth throughout the skin. Overdose leads to permanent twitches.

This large globular fruit contains large amounts of water but very little else. It is mostly tasteless although can be used in common recipes. It is vastly improved by being a base product in cooking rather than being the primary dish.
These are various pieces of furniture and common household objects produced by the natives of Falconia. Generally perches of huge proportions are not included in the list.

The greater ground bird is the only product of consequence among the wide variety of life found in the forests of Falconia. These tend to be hunted by flocks of natives and dropped into collection compounds from great heights to break bones. Falconians tend to eat their meat raw and fresh, shipping of world requires preparation. Preparation of the meat primarily removes shards of bones and grit.
This covers a range of items that while old cannot be specifically identified. It is often the case that this lack of identification is on purpose to hide the lack of intrinsic value.
This is not used by the natives that have their own feathers, but is produced solely for exportation.
This is a faint fragrance that while not the best is still bought for novelty value.
These have been found in ancient caves and belong to a species that died out due to disease long ago.
This ancient coral is found far above sea level on account of rising land masses. The rare variety of cobolt blue coral is highly prized.
Even a small drop requires the pressing of millions of microscopic creatures. The results though are a rather pleasent feeling that can strike at random in any part of the body.
The gothic style jewellery is based on the use of obsidian volcani glass of a mineral composition unique to this planet.

Tyburn amber is quiet common on account of the ancient forests that have dominated much of the planet for millions of years. These forests are famous of the large amounts of sticky sap that they produce. It is this sap that forms the amber, invariably trapping many small insects and seeds as permanent fossil records. Only the very best amber is used.

This covers a range of natural drugs that induce a feeling of well-being and when used occasionally improve mental performance during the high. As this is followed by a prolonged period of 'drunkenness' and lethargy, it is avoided in professional circles.

This range of drugs modifies perception for a short period of time, allowing a person to 'enjoy' stimuli. While they do cause some synaptic damage and displacement of neural pathways, this is only considered serious in habitual users.

Stocky wool is produced from the sheep of No E. These placid creatures run wild but will quickly gather round anyone with a handful of grains or in fact anything that is more edible than the planet wide heather.
This is nothing more than a small piece of rock with a plaque reading "I've been in Exile".

This covers an ever expanding range of books, enovels, plays, films and such produced by the civilians of the Detinus Republic.
Due to the massive stockpiles of Detinus Media available on the market, the value has dropped significantly. Many of the items can now be found in charity stores. This is likely to remain until the stockpiles are vastly reduced.
This is incredibly sweet, so much so that it is only normally used sparingly. It source is a tall reed that in spring drips so much that collection is simplicity in itself.
The monstrous dog hunts virtually anything on the planet. Luckily it is quite rare. It is normally kept in zoos and manageries even if reared from pup.
Spland glass production uses a range of minerals unique to this world in order to make a startling range of glassware. Unfortunately it tends to be easily broken.
Frog fries are made from a species found only on this world. They are battered in a special recipe made from local produce and deep fried until golden brown.

Originally titled Confederate art, these works typify the combative nature of the culture. Many of the paintings are bold and dramatic. Scenes of death and destruction as well as battling against great odds often form the central themes.

Moss vodka is actually produced from the root system of the remarkable plant. Refining is little more than the removal of harmful bacteria and enzymes. The powerful drink is generally a clear blue colour although this becomes rainbow hued when a few drops of water are added.

The dragonfly of NoE is large, the biggest attaining a length of over 35cm although it weighs less than 150g. They are generally a deep blue colour although upon heating during cooking, this turns to a deep scarlet colour. They are an acquired taste that does not suit everybody's palate.
Despite the name, these are of high quality and unique to this world. They are used primarily in the making of jewelly through the addition of precious metals.

This is produced from a peculiar natural fog that exists on the world. When exposed, it is capable of stripping grease and other organic residues with little trouble, although should only be used in a well ventilated room.
This is made from the fermentation of unique cacti found only on this world. The potent drink is ruthless with both inhibitions and memory which is just as well.
These creatures take over three decades to reach full size and during that period they are subject to the predations of many other creatures.

These are laid by a creature that spends part of its year as a male and the rest as a female. Eggs suitable for eating should be opaque. Any clarity indicates that they will be bitter due to embryonic development.

The bug is actually red moss and grow bugs that form a symbiotic relationship which leads to the production of oxygen. This is used in terraforming a planet. Each grow bug (10mu item) will improve a planet with an atmosphere by as much as a single week's output from a terraforming complex. These can only be seeded on worlds with temperatures between 250 and 290. A special action will release up to as much growbugs as are present.
This drug should only be taken in small doses. It's narcotic effects lead to numbing of the muscles and a general dulling of the senses. Low addiction/danger.
The hides have to be treated using a number of chemicals to both soften the hide and preserve it.
These small creatures tend to climb out of whatever they are stored in. Luckily they are harmless, feeding on vegetation.

This creature appears to be similar to a giant inchworm with extended 'feet'. It moves by stabilising itself with one foot and moving the other forwards. This makes movement slow, but as the creature is an herbivore on the grasslands, this is of little concern. Most of the creature can be consumed.
The drug is related to the common heaven herb. This one however also contains a number of other natural compounds that further the release of endorphins.

Kusari was developed by the FET. They have not even attempted to request it to be legalized by the Empire. It has phenomenally high morale boosting effects in colonies and is every governors' dream. Long term effects have not been studied in the rush to exploit this new wonder drug. The FET are keeping the secret of production to themselves, but analysis only reveals complex organic compounds.
The knowledge of how to produce the most potent artifically manufactured drugs known to the peripheries.

Blind fish is toxic is eaten in large amounts. Further, unless the toxin is removed immediately after being caught, it will spread and ruin the food. As such it has to be carefully prepared before being shipped off-world.
These deep red gems are highly prized, at least by those rare few that can afford them.
Plantmesh is an odd filiment-like plant that grows in a knotted clump. Analysis reveals that it is artifically created through gene manipulation.
These are stripped from the huge whale analogues that swim the oceans of Mobile Bay. They have many uses as consumer goods although they are generally used for decorative purposes.
Dundar salt is extracted from the huge trees that can be found in the salt marshes. The extract is used as a high-class condiment to cooking as it also imparts a unique taste that many find pleasant.
The Foil Fish is called this name because of the wide variety of very bright colours of their scales. They make excellent aquatic pets.
The jewellery is noted for the diamonds used, which contrary to their trade name do not contain black spots.

TechManual.value: Tasty mushrooms

items.TechManual: This semi-precious mineral is mined from secret vaults deep under the crust.
The brandy is a natural product produced by the firepearl plant. It is a strange and powerful drink that should only be consumed in small doses.
These are produced from the giant herbivore found on the world. The meat is nothing spectacular.
This is useful for the range of planetary bodies it will grow on. Also it can be transported in a vacuum.

TechManual.value: These small aquatic predators make excellent pets.

items.TechManual: This comes in various colours although reds predominate. It can be soaked in special solutions which make it pliable for a short period of time. This is done to mold them into pleasing shapes.
The fancy skin of this small but mean reptile is generally used to make high chic clothing such as footwear and cases.
The bird is adept at repeated spoken language and along with bright plumage and what can only be described as a cheerful personality, makes an ideal pet. It does not however appear to be intelligent.

The feathers come in various shades or green and blue although the rarest and most highly prized are a deep indigo with scarlet highlights. Generally the bird analogue from which they are taken is not killed during the process.
The swamp slipper is a creature with a large shell which it uses to displace water, i.e. as a boat. In times of danger it will submerge and sink to the bottom of the lake.
These skins are a pale yellow/brown colour and are incredibly soft. Their use is primarily as footwear or body hugging clothing.
These rare and beautiful items are sought out by collectors the galaxy over.
These contain large amounts of a sugary substance that makes them both appealing and quite sickly. They are generally processed to produce confectionary.

Plantex is produced from a fibrous plant that grows in desert conditions. It is able to produce a light cuticle that prevents virtually all water from escaping but has superior thermal conduction properties which change with light levels.
Roo wheat is the crop grown by the natives on this world. They are reputed to be excellent farmers and the versitility of their crop speaks for itself.
The hounds are large and aggressive although no match for a blaster. Still, civilians tend to find them useful for guarding against indigenous predators.
The deep sea kelp is fairly bland but rich in vitamins. As such it is generally served with other foodstuffs.

The small creature is known as the fire shrimp as the process of cooking it causes it to glow with a deep organge flickering light. The brightness of the fire is directly linked to the freshness of the shrimp.

Hive silk is made by special techniques that draw strands from the hive egg. Each egg is able to produce 2mu of silk during this stage of its life cycle which is a metamorphic period which can last years. It is no longer considered part of the starbase assets, i.e. removed during production.
This blueprint allows the extraction of fine strands of silk to be extracted and processed from hive eggs. The process pushes the egg into the metamorphic stage which can last up to decades.
Fern nodules are extremely slow growing but easy to find in the forest of Capella. They are considered both an aphrodisiac and a delicacy.
The plant has a thick outer casing that requires considerable effort on behalf of the chef to break. Within though is a succulent fleshy material that is highly prized.
This is fairly tasteless and its only value in distant locations is as a novelty. Even the kastorians have long since largely supplanted it with other foods.
The smallest fish are the most tasty although these are generally sold alongside the larger fish to conserve supplies.
The steaks taken from this water snake are succulent and very tasty although their vicious nature means that more than one has been butchered to reveal a finger from a careless worker.
Sugar eggs are the eggs produced a small insect collected in the first few days after being laid. The insect coats them in glutinous syrup. This is absorbed through the shell.
The beast is swift moving an dangerous. Only the use of scanners and high powered hand weaponry is sufficient to take down one of these fine creatures.
Each mu represents part of a single print run of roughly 10 million data slugs featuring the classical literature of the felini. Pirate copies can be found everywhere these originals are found.
This small fresh water fish is not particularly tasty but can be prepared in a few special ways.
This is fermented from the wheat grown by the natives of this world.
Flatty stalkers are predators that prey on the flatty creatures of Gangrene. Trophies made from their skulls and frontal appendages are sought after for hunting lodges the Peripheries over.
The delicate meat from this aquatic crustacean is worth every stellar it costs.
Cat willow is a strong slender plant that lends itself to the production of excellent furniture.

Carnivorous aquatic animals with sonar senses and very big teeth. It would seem at first glance that they were unsuitable creatures for improving colony morale but they do have one redeeming feature. They emit a powerful pheromone that induces contentment and calm. This is used to trap its prey in the wild but in captivity it makes it perfect for menageries.

TechManual.value: A sweet smelling perfume produced from a rare forest flower.

items.TechManual: Block eels are used both a low quality food and as oils for cooking. Primarily only the adults are used as the flesh from young eels tends to be tough. The meat has a very strong detinctive flavour that does not appeal to most although some find it intersting, especially the felini.

These huge lizard analogues have evolved in isolation within the rift valleys of the world. Their skins are rare in that they change colour with temperature even after their death. This feature along with the soft texture make them ideal for chic clothing.
While expensive it is still a high bulk item. It is said that some of the finest buildings on Earth have statues and floors carved from this rock.
These are used by coastal colonists to purify seawater for local aquatic life - amongst other uses.
These huge herbivores are hunted for their uniform hides. These are used exclusively for clothing production.
Moss tisane is a relaxing drink produced from the tundra moss of Eridani. The processing requires the use of fresh moss heaven herb. The final product is not addictive.
The strange creature is little more than a mouth and tentacles. The limbs are removed during preparation and only the region surrounding the central apex is consumed.

There are numerous antiques and curios scattered across the Peripheries produced long ago by the species which later developed into the Hive and Ant Nation. The artefacts have no intrinsic value although make excellent conversation pieces. Certain ones can even be made to emit their original pheremones.
This covers a range of semi-exotic fruits which grow in abundance within the rain forests of this world.
This is similar to standard dalium hydroxide, although slightly more powerful and with interesting side effects such as skin mottling.
Extracted from the large aquatic life forms of this world, the oil is used for high quality cosmetics.
The toothless cat feeds on insects and other such small creatures. While being largely independent, it will adapt and become partially domesticated.
The botolphian pearl takes years, possibly centuries to grow. They are cream coloured although can have a opalesque sheen to them.

Botolphian honey is producted by a variety of insects found on the world, the smallest of which are only a few millimetres across. The highly prized taste is directly related to the variety of flowering plants found on the world.
Kastorian foods are pre-prepared by special complexes using a blend of various foods taken exclusively from kastorian cuisine.
The skin of the arboreal snake makes some excellent hardwearing clothing.
So called on account of the surprising colours. This decorative ivory accounts for only a few bones within the creature.
The truffle is a small fungus that grows on dead trees within the gap between the bark and the wood. Each truffle is only a few centimetres in size but exceptionally tasty.

This indigenous aquatic food source was the staple diet of the native species of the world. Both hive and ant are still fond of it although most other life forms shun it.
As promoted by Bogey Richards - Media Ace
These unusual alien aquatic creatures make excellent pets for civilians.
There are over two hundred species that vary in colour and taste, but as they are exploited equally, they are classed as a single resource.

Chichester glass is unique in that there are a number of naturally occuring chemicals present in the glass, allowing it to make durable but delicate items. Despite their durability, as with all glass objects, accidents happen (perishable).
This item covers the range of fruit such as apples, bananas, grapes and figs, seeded from Old Earth throughout the Peripheries.
These have to be transported while alive. Worse, they have a very short lifespan outside of their native ecology so tend to die relatively quickly.
This small plant grows slowly but is easily found on account of its distinctive smell. It takes more than a tonne of the substance in order to generate a single bottle of the essence.
The sand crab may not look particularly glamorous but the meat makes it especially attractive. Anyone that has eaten crab meat imported from Earth will agree that they will never go back.
Cedar Mudpacks are produced from the rich minerals found only on this planet (or so the adverts would have us believe). They are especially sought after by humans on account of their bare skin.
The obsidian has iridescence that gives it a unique appearence and makes it quite valuable.
The oil is taken from the aquatic creature and used in various culinary dishes although the Hive prefer to drink it neat.

TechManual.value: A variety of fungi and mushrooms named after the discoverer.

items.TechManual: The greenslash has emerald green striped fur. The creature is vicious but hunters face the danger in order to obtain the sought-after pelts.
The marrow of the leviathans is highly prized for its versatility and taste.
These are the tips of the roots and while edible by all are prefered by the dewiek.

TechManual.value: A heavenly tasting mushroom.
So called for its multihued flesh. It is also quite tasty.

items.TechManual: These are planted on other worlds to improve the aesthetic qualities of the infrastructure. They also serve as shade and can be used for lumber.

A complex blend of minerals and some microscopic flora gives the water its unique taste. While it could theoretically be produced in the lab, this would cost more than shipping it to the most distant trading post.
These creatures have bright carapaces and many legs, appearing similar to some aquatic shellfish.
The bat is both cute and remarkably friendly making it an ideal pet.

Alien aquatic flora covers a group of plants that are highly adaptable to extreme environments. They can be seeded on worlds that have either no or very little life in order to establish vegetation in aqueous regions that currently have none. Normally 1,000mu's of alien aquatic flora is required in order to convert an aqueous lifeless terrain into one containing and supporting life. Alien aquatic flora can only be used on a world that has a breathable atmosphere. Multiple sectors can be seeded in a single special action although the GM is the final arbitrator on what will be effective.

This covers a range of jellies, each with a unique taste. When cooked properly there is sufficient remaining poison to produce a strange tingle that can last for a few hours and is generally found to be pleasent.
A fungi that grows in deep bat filled caves. Only the youngest are edible.
This is refined from the stemans of the rare flowers of this world. The chemical composition cannot be replicated in the laboratory making this the only known source.
These shells are often used in the construction of warbots on account of the resilience to energy, both kinetic and energy. Their colour and peculiar shape also make them a popular wall adornment.
This covers an entire range of items that are suited to the tastes of the bast. The bast being the generic name for both the felini and the clans.
The large fish are found only in the cold waters of the arctic seas of Haven. The are rather bland tasting although suitable to some forms of cooking.

These giant crustaceans can grow up to a metre in diameter. There are more than five cuts of meat although the poorest is the most common. They are always transferred alive as they quickly spoil when they are killed and presperving does not seem to work.
The meat within the claws is strong but extremely tasty. It can only be served in small amounts due to its toxic nature.
These only grow for a very short period of weeks and part of their value is based on this very short growing season.

The spice is used in the preparation of a sauce by the same name. This is a deep red colour and has a bitter but appealing taste. It is primarily used for meats although can be modified to produce sharp tasting biscuits.
These have a rather distinctive taste that puts most people of tasting them but for those that enjoy them, they will happily pay over the odds.

TechManual.value: The delicate taste of these peculiar fungi is highly prized.

items.TechManual: This grows in only one known location. It the star shaped fruit from the frond plant. This plant is native to the shallows of the world where it thrives in the warm nutrient rich waters.

TechManual.value: Food wrapped in Detinus Media.

items.TechManual: These are slices from leviathans that have an uncanny resemblence to terrestial coral reefs.
Fermented from Big E Grass Pods, this clear spirit has quite an appealing taste.

The reef salamander lives only in one location on the world. Here is gorges on the vast food reserves of the warm waters growing to magnificent lengths. The meat is tender and requires little cooking.

Himer fish actually covers a number of species of uniquely tasting aquatic creatures found on this world. Together they make an entire branch of cuisine that is remarkably subtle on account of the lack of a need for cooking. It is almost as though the culinary knowledge has been developed over decades.

This miniature replica of a photon gun has a fibre core and a soft rubber surface, it vibrates and will generate very nice sensual explosions if utilized correctly. Rumors have it this item is Michelle Diaz's favourite way of finding relief from a long day of pacifying the peripheries...
This sauce is the secretion from reef fauna. Aquatic creatures appear to enjoy eating whatever it sticks to although its appeal to land bound sapients is limited.

These tastly little morsels can be found in the saline swamps of Carrier. They should only be killed at the time of consumption to maintain their freshness and dead ones should be discarded before cooking.

TechManual.value: A selection of fruits from the vegetation of this fertile world.

items.TechManual: The fruit has a soft grey flesh with bright pink blotches. It is both sweet and juicy though not everybodies favourite.

The Trafalgar Chrysalis is the metamorphic stage of the Trafalgar Moth before it turns in to a Caterpillar. The metamorphic duration is quite short, resulting in the Chrysalis being perishable. The Chrysalis breaks down quickly if it is not kept alive, and once dead the Chrysalis loses the properties that make it a good source of food. In particular Falconians find the Chrysalis to be extremely tasty.

These creatures are soft bodied entities with many arms, and for some reason they are called Ressurection Aqua Babies. They use their arms to net areas of the sea between the rocks that litter the sea bed. these ensnare the blind fish of the sea and drown the them by forcing water backwards over the gills. They are attractive to look at and they make interesting alien pets.

TechManual.value: These small furry rodent analogues are cute and remarkably tame.
The delicate flesh is prized for both colour and taste.

items.TechManual: This covers a range of rare desert plants that grow slowly but taste wonderful.
This covers a large number of jungle fruits from the world. They are worth more than standard food but are not luxury.

TechManual.value: A range of fruits that grow in the alpine regions of the planet.

items.TechManual: The horned herbivore is common to the world and its meat is very destinctive.
This covers a range of woven items, each handmade using local plants, dyes and techniques that have been passed down through the ages.

The creature is eaten during the nymph stage. The entire creature is consumed, although as it is less than a centimetre in length anything else would be difficult to prepare. The taste is delicate and unique. It is a firm favourite with naplians, who actually prefer it while it is still alive.
These noisy seabirds have quite an unusual taste that is not to everyone's taste.

TechManual.value: This covers a range a aquatic food from the world.

items.TechManual: This covers a range of scarce exotic pelagic life that are exploited for their unique taste.
These wines are grown by the monks of Paradise from grapes transported from Earth long before the climate became unsuitable for outdoor growth.

TechManual.value: This is extracted from the swollen bodies of small insects.

items.TechManual: This sickly sweet substance is used to store water for the plant by the same name. The jelly comes in a number of distinctive flavours all of which are impossible to describe. It is highly prized as it can apparently only be obtained for a few short weeks per year.

These creatures, while amphibious are capable of short bursts of flight which appear comical to onlookers. While they need a fairly open habitat, once they have become used to the location they will remain in the vicinity.

TechManual.value: The perfume is made from rare mountain flowers.
These are very rare but the fur is highly prized.

items.TechManual: These are quite resilient to environmental changes making them good for agricultural infrastructure improvements.
These creatures produce large amounts of electricity. They can be used by colonists in order to generate a renewable source of power.
This pheromone extraction from exotic creatures is apparently reputed to cause females to obey their carnal needs - at least that is what it states on the bottle.
This large arboreal creature has a thick hide that is highly prized.
The boletus are a range of mushrooms and fungi analogues that can be found in the jungles of the world. They are similar poisonous species.
The unusual grey patterned skins also scintillate under certain lighting conditions.
This dense wood when polished and used as veneer is vastly more expensive than the untreated timber.

TechManual.value: For best results keep alive until required.

items.TechManual: This stronger variant of heaven herb only grows in the unique ecology of George.
The moleskin while black can flash all colours of the rainbow under most artificial lighting, making it unique and quite popular.
The patterned herbivore hides are from small legless creatures. Each hide is unique and remarkably smooth despite being formed from scales.

Macberries are a deep magenta in colour. They can be eaten raw although are best cooked in order to remove some of the bitterness. They have a slight euphoric effect although this is very short lived and merely enhances the taste. They are especially favoured by the Falconians.

This is quite simply the most expensive drug in the universe. It has the power to prolong life and is highly sought after by all humans. The properties however also have moderately beneficial properties for other species.
A truly vicious beast that has to be watched at all times. Taking it off world would not be advisable although it has to be used fresh.
These agile beasts can be quite ferocious until a simple sterilisation operation is carried out on them.
The spruce is found high in the mountains of the world. It is incrediably beautiful, if bulky.
Centuries without a single scrap of arable land has produced some of the finest tasting yeast in the galaxy.
These are carved from the rare blue stone found on this world. Now that they have become publicly known they will be more widely sought after. The value has increased appropriately.
These creatures need good pasture and open plains or grasslands to wander.
This is served in its aquamarine blue shells. The taste cannot be described but must be sampled to be appreciated (no it does not taste like chicken). It is a particular hit with the Felini.
Wriggling and squirting acid, these things while edible only appeal to the hive as a palatable food source.
These docile creatures are hermaphroditic herbivores. The feed on grasses and ground plants but are capable of consuming bark.

This is a selection of foods from the finest that can be shipped from the secret mohache homeworld. Those wanting to sample the authentic recipes first hand should seek passage to the world, if they can.

These are believed to have animal intelligence and can communicate at a basic level through the use of bioluminescent pulses. Each point has different colour that together produce coloured light effect.

These range from typical green through blue and indigo. Very occasionally a yellow or even an orange creature is found although they are quite rare. The alien pets are a fragile cargo (living and perishable).

This doglike creature is quite intelligent but not particularly friendly. With two extra limbs used for manipulation, it is best to keep the creature well caged. The pet though is still fairly popular.
The weak and brittle wood looks very nice when polished. It is generally used for facings and veneer.
There are over twenty species of fish eaten regularly by the natives of the world. In fact fish is the number one dish, more popular than meats derived from livestock.
Jesuit Scarlet actually refers to the dye that is found only on this planet. The dye is used in the manufacture of clothing unique to this planet.
Sap mead is fermented from tree sap. The syrupy drink is quite potent and the should be drank with caution to begin with.

The pump tree has a very specialised bark system that can move water even when it is below freezing. This has been modfied by civilians to be used as a low temperature self-repairing irrigation system.
Chickafruits are one of the staple foods of the natives of this world. The fruit is versatile and can be used for many different types of cooking.

Jesuit furs are the skins from an arboreal creature that looks vaguely like an old Earth squirrel. The fur is however very thick and long and comes in a range of colours from glossy black to pale fawn.
Super fine iridescent scales taken from the sea eels are stitched to clothing in order to make incredibly bright and beautiful clothing. It is highly prized by humans.
Small pelagic creatures that have a vague resemblance to literary creatures from ancient Earth. They make interesting pets.
Silver candy is a sweet substance with a taste that cannot be described any better than a taste of heaven. It is created by a termite creature and stored within the bark of a large tree.
The mohush is a cane plant that contains a sweet syrup. The tips of the cane are most highly prized and are devoured by the Hive with great relish.

Mohache gems are carved in the same way as they have been for hundreds of years. This explains their rather mishapen sides. The mohache insist that they are unique because of it. They are especially favoured amongst naplians for symbolic reasons.
These hides are skinned from a unique reptile with fur. The colours are unusual and the texture is remarkable, making them excellent for designer outfits.
These are cute little creatures that make excellent pets. The felini are especially fond of them although they tend to quickly wear out...
These cover a range of avian creatures that can be found around the rivers and lakes of the plains. They make a good meal.

Seed wheat is a fast growing crop that is sought after by colonists for planting. It is both hardy and quick growing. Its other advantage is that it rarely suffers from cross-pollination. It is believed to have originated on the planet Doubt.
There are many species of Himer Lilies but all share their tolerance of changing salinity levels. This makes them appealing for planting on planets with significant coastlines.

This intoxicating essence is extracted from the grasses found in the remote corners of the desert. So powerful is the natural substance, that it can attract insects from hundreds of kilometres away. Obviously the perfume is of a much reduced strength.

Drift nuts fall from plants that grow on the swamp islands. The currents carry them along until they wash ashore. Only then do they germinate. The largest nut can be as big a half a metre in size and takes a pneumatic hammer to open.
This drug is generally smoked in pipes. The opiates produce a peaceful mood that rarely poses much of a danger to health.

This plant produces flowers that attract pests and then consumes them in a vat of peptic juices. They are made use of by civilian farmers for reducing pest levels in an environmentally friendly fashion. Borders need only contain a few blue bushes to be effective.
Each stein is unique, hand made from clay, fired and glazed. They are topped with metal lids with unique engraving. Each one is different and the number if limited making them unique.
The Frolic Sardine is the pride of the world and exists in huge shoals.
The plump avian creature is regarded as a superior staple food. It is often cooked by roasting.
The drink is made by pulping the juice from the seeds of the plant. It becomes bitter and undrinkable if left.
The pang wren is a small dark bird that at first appears drab. When it opens it wings however the underside is shown in full techni-colour.

There are a number of beasts that the mohache consider superior to anything currently found in the Peripheries. These beasts are suited to many terrains although the mohache tend to use mountain pastures.
The shells of these beetles is all that is exploited. The carcass is disposed of before shipping. The carapace have a glossy lustre and are nearly frictionless.

The bungles are small arboreal creatures with a face similar to a human child. They are generally sold groups as the felini that rear them do so primarily to improve the hunting skills of their children. A felini infant can generally get through a dozen over the course of a week.

Yannish plums covers a range of similar exotic fruits that grow from semi-aquatic plants found in the mountainous jungles. The value of the plums can be increased to 400 should they become common knowledge.
These creatures are edible though something of an acquired taste. Rumour has it the locals prefer seeded stock brought from Earth.
The oil extracted from the larger sea creatures of the world is inedible. It does however have a number of external and specialist.
The shell, skinned from a rare breed of turtle is highly decorative. As the creature is killed and discarded, some see exploiting this object as barbaric.
These have potential for genetic breeding witth seeded life in order to improve tolerance to radiation. This is useful for worlds with thin atmospheres.

Only the choicest dangly bits with suckers and tentacles are used in the making of this peculiar line of clothing. Unsurprisingly it appeals most to humans - though even there there are only a few willing to wear it in public.
These creatures have an irritating cough that makes them unappealing as a pet. Only the flagrtiz find amusement in torturing them.

The glass was produced by the introduction of some rather peculiar elements into the terrain during the destruction of the ring world. While expensive, it is also incredibly dense, which makes its value per mu relatively low.
The small bird produces the most delightful songs while it is content. It does however have a tendency to drop dead for no apparent reason.
While it chemical properties are fairly well documented, it mystical and psychological properties are as huge as the advertising campaign behind it.
These small brown and red fungi are found lining the bottom of swift moving rivers. They are best served fresh but can be dried and used within a short time.

The moss booby is a flightless bird that feeds on the moss found covering much of the mountains of Infection. It is quite a docile bird but can leap large gaps making the hunting of them quite difficult. They have not been possible to domesticate.
These are a variety of dishes utilising the local produce of the world.
Stone Eggs appear as large round grey balls up to 15 cm in diameter. They are highly nutritious sought after.

TechManual.value: The purple colour of the crabs is highly prized as a veneer.

items.TechManual: These are produced during the metamorphosis of a unique arboreal larvae. They are tiny glass beads.

This is taken as fine shavings from the outer bark of the silicate trees found on this world. The appearance is very unusual and while can be mimicked commercially the real item is easily distinguishable.

These small green shoots can be eaten raw although benefit from being heavily salted first. They have a bitter spicy taste although this is part of the appeal. They are named after the planet of origin rather than for any real resemblence to the ancient Earth dish, now commonly available in rec complexes the universe over.
They are cute and colourful, but their most interesting trait is the ability to mimic sounds.
The brandy is produced through a series of fermantations and fortifying processes. It is especially enjoyed by the dewiek.
This covers an array of equipment useful to colonists in improving the planetary economy. As such it falls into the life category rather than trade goods.

This plant rapidly grows wild on a planet and can colonise even rocky ground. 1000mu's is normally required to seed in a breathable planet (1mu per sector). After a year it is probable that the source can be tapped for building materials. The weekly change will be based on the area of sectors colonised (root) but will never be much greater than the width of the world. The plant will generally interfere with native ecologies so should be used with extreme care although off-world species are often susceptible to defoliants (1mu per sector).
This colourful fish while inedible is still prized for its appearence.
This is rather a friendly creature and will quite happily play with humanoids for hours. Despite its name it is a herbivore and will eat virtually any plants.

The green fin is an aquatic creature that dwells close to the surface. It is small but swift. The natives use barbed spears to catch it and usually eat it raw. Civilised tastes prefer to use various condiments on the fish including mildly acidic fruit juices and salt. The felini however do not care for the impairing of the taste.

Barb seeds are deep red like the aquatic plant that produces them. The outer casing splits during baking and frees the sweet and soft seed within. Once removed the seed is often cooked again with many other foods. Due to the aquatic origin of the seed, it quickly decays if not consumed.
Heffer meat is prized both for its nutritional value and its taste. It is most highly prized by the dewiek. They tend to prefer it raw.

The pang finch flies in great flocks although it is found that most of these are all female. Only a few are bull finches. Only the bull finch sings and then only if surrounded by a plethora of females.
This large marsupial is friendly and easily domesticated. It is not suitable for eating.

This is removed from the white tundra elephants. The process does not endanger the elephants although they do not regrow the tusks. As they also use the tusks to scap snow from the ground, the winters are likely to be harder on the herds that have been de-tusked.

This is brewed from various plants found on the planets in the Tranquillity system. It is then laced with heaven herb. It proves a firm favourite with adolescents loitering around outdoor recreational facilities.

The hogs have a staple diet of bamboo although they will eat most things even if they are poisonous. This means that they are normally slaughtered before leaving the world. They are slaughtered for many food products, primarily simple meats that have a limited following.

Michels wort can be planted on worlds similar to Boomerang in order to develop a wild source of medical supplies. The maximum planetary yields is based on the planetary conditions and relative shallow regions. It normally requires 100mu's per sector seeded.

This marine gastropod is so called on account of its beautiful colouring that is retained and even enhanced by cooking. The intestinal tract has to be removed before cooking as it can bleed toxins into the dish that although not fatal can be inconveniencing.
These hand sized pods are taken from the huge grasses that dominate the open flat lands. Each pod contains a number of very sweet seeds that taste like confectionary.
This covers a variety of fruit native to the world that have been cultivated through conservative means.
This is clothing made from silk produced from hive eggs. The substance is durable and can hold colour well if processed correctly.
The leffinphant is a small domesticated quadraped with a prehensile probosis. They have course hair and are used both a beasts of burden on developing worlds and as a food source everywhere else.

The shells of the tundra tortoise are anything from translucent to clear but all produce scintillation patterns. The clearest are the most prized although as they normally covered with skin and hair, the creatures normally have to be slaughtered in order to discover what type of shell it has.
These small creatures root for food in the earth, digging up and eating virtually anything. Despite this though the meat is extremely tasty and prized the galaxy over, but especially by Felini.
The are tadpoles about the size of a modest fish. The flesh is firm and tasty and filling.
Taken from a few select species the oil of these fish can only be extracted at certain times of the year.
These small wriggling bugs are found in the grasslands. They are generally consumed whole and alive, though often dipped in spice powder first.
The finch is brightly coloured and almost affectionate making it an ideal pet.

Fluters are large insect herbivores. While they are not much to look at, they use hollow grass reads against their many spiracles to produce notes. The largest can have more than thirty, each producing a unique note. They are also capable of copying tunes they hear.
These are named after the old Earth aquatic creature on account of their appearence rather than taste. While tasting very nice, they have virtually nutritional properties.
These small creatures are brightly coloured and make ideal pets. They eat anything although prefer vegetation with iron.

These small creatures feed on the native plants that bear a peculiar resemblance to creatures. As such these avian creatures tend to feed only on small warm-blooded creatures such as vermin. They are much prized by farmers.

Chickaweed is seaweed of rather unpleasant taste and texture. The hive however can't seem to get enough of it - different tastes.
(Max value = $0.5 if common knowledge)

The icebug is a small creature that has small lungs that are able to compress air. This is then blasted out as an adiabatic expansion to a point where the plant stems targeted freeze and the cells rupture. The small brightly coloured bugs then lick the sap.
(max value = $1.200 if common knowledge)
This is the flesh taken from a delicate quadruped found within the forests of Nirvana. The best cuts are taken when the creature is killed instantly without having time to build-up muscle acids.
The sapphire fish is a small aquatuc creature that is a metallic blue in colour. It is popular of xeno-aquarium keepers on account of it happily co-existing with other marine life.
The golden dazzler is a moderately sized aquatic creature that while edible, is said to be an acquired taste. The felini however enjoy it especially if served in a large tank of water.

Everyone in the Beach system for more than a few years has at one time or another been forced to consume vast quantities of jellyfish, as a stew, fried, soup and the likes. Most hate is simply through over exposure.

Fire pearls glow with a flickering orange and red glow. This is on account of a natural but harmless bacteria within the shell. The pearls have to be kept within a mild salt solution when not in use to prevent the bacteria from dieing.
This is brewed from the peace meal plant found on the planets in the Tranquillity system. It is then distilled into a fine liquor. It proves a firm favourite with those wealthy enough to afford it.
The fur is luxurious and highly prized by natives. The best pelts are taken from females as they have much less scar material.
Gold perfume is named after the tiny golden flowers from which it is produced. The essence should never be worn on the world as it attracts certain insects. It is especially favoured by the Felini.
These small decorative trees are quite hardy but very slow growing. They make enchanting decorations but have no other use.
The buit bird loves to sing. It will tweet, cheep, chirp, twitter and warble happily for hours. Should you chirp back it will redouble its efforts. it does however tend to die very easily.
The fish from the rich arctic waters come in all sizes, shapes and tastes. A typical mu contains at least a dozen varieties of creature.
The art tends to feature the aspects of the world that appeal to Dewiek. Images of wildernesses suited to hunting as well as some trophies are much admired by the Dewiek.

The crab measures about 15 centimetres across the shell, almost 30cm across the leg span. Its claws are powerful enough to give a nasty nip but not to seriously harm a crewmember. The crabs use them to keep the snow snakes at bay but, more often than not, they end up as snake food. It's surprising - the crab flesh is rich in nutrient and delicious - wealth worth cracking a shell for.
Cherry berries are used in a number of recipes to produce sweet tasting pies that cannot be produced using any substitute. They are especially popular with the hive on account of their sweet taste.
These rare minerals are similar to opals although they actually glow in many different flickering colours after being subjected to sunlight.

The creature is a tough looking beast although fairly predictable making it relatively easy to capture. Only its horns are exploited. The rest of is either released or destroyed. Ferrals released back into the wild are often attacked by others of their species as dominance is based on the size of the creature's horns.
Only the fleshy part of the creature is eaten and this has to be cooked in a special manner in order to appreciate the full flavour. The flagritz however are great lovers of the slimy food.

TechManual.value: These are the delicate tendrils taken from the jellyfish.

items.TechManual: This is pie made from the bluebird and numerous vegetables and seeds found only on this world. While each ingredient is not unique the end dish is.
These are made from the polished plates of the armoured herbivores. The colour and lustre is very unusual.
Jupiter syrup is the sweet sap drained from the tree by the same name. The sticky sweet substance is a firm favourite amongst the hive.
The scalps of the jacob owl are used as cosmetic abrasives. Only the elite uses them, as their expense is not really justified by the results.

The meat from this creature is not particularly palatable although when dressed with local herbs do produce some very unusual dishes that while not being on a par with typical luxuries are nonetheless unique.
Sea Vodka was discovered when colonists found that the seaweed common to the world made a reasonable substitute for vegetables traditionally used.

The grokfinch lays tiny eggs that have to be cooked in a specific manner to ensure that they taste just right. They are of questionable taste that appeals primarily to the wimbles for some unknown reason.

These large eggs can be served in a number of ways despite their rather unusual flavour. They are considered a meal in their own right although often accompany other foods. They are most definitely a delicacy.

The whipper is an arboreal lizard that is not only vicious but also a pack hunter. This though is no match for automated gassing, collection and skinning machines. Their hides are prized by humans that seem to feel better when clothed in the skins of other creatures.
This white wine is best consumed chilled. It has a unique taste that stimulates the appetite. It is believed to be a little bit of an aphrodisiac.

Berry Glow is a fine perfume that is especially appealing to humans. This is believed to be cultivated from a grub although the manufacturers downplay this aspect, instead concentrating their adverts on the exotic location that is Indochina.

Nirvana blooms are found exclusively in forest clearings. Around forty species of flowering plants are marketed, each unique in some respect. They are incredibly delicate and sensitive to changes in the environment.
Crimson granite is so called because of its blood red colour. It is found on on this world and is sought after by those wanting something special.

The dralon looks like an organic road roller. It is little more than a cylinder that rolls around squashing and eating smaller creatures. While not indigenous to this world, it is currently not found on any other. The original seeders of the creature may well like the taste more than the current residents of the Peripheries.
These have to be protected from the pest that can turn whole batches into mush. The grapes are often used for both deserts and fermentation into fine wines.
Unger sheep are docile and quiet. They are prized by civilian farmers as they are both a source of wool and meat.
The thick tender flesh of the six legged bovine creature is considered superior to many other meats (mu for mu).
This rather unusual tasting amphibian is something of an aquired taste.

Arctic plantlife covers a group of plants that are suitable for aiding in the terraforming of subzero worlds. They can be seeded on worlds that have either no or very little life in order to establish vegetation in regions that currently have none. Normally 1,000mu's of arctic plantlife is required in order to convert a flat lifeless terrain into a vegetation (probably tundra) terrain. This plantlife can only be used on a world that has a breathable atmosphere. Multiple sectors can be seeded in a single special action although the GM is the final arbitrator on what will be effective.
These delicate shellfish have long protruding tentacles that taste superb. They are a big hit with the Wimbles despite them not being particularly fond of aquatic foods.
The peculiar mollusc feeds mainly on rocks, extracting chemicals and minerals. These give it a unique taste.
These nocturnal creatures have a very sweet taste, though their appearance is not to everyone's palate.
Variants of these are found throughout the Peripheries. The only thing that unites them is an aversion to eating them by most sentient species. Natives however tend to have a fondness for them.

TechManual.value: The thin fuzzy fur makes moderately attractive unique clothing.

items.TechManual: Gnarly veneer is prized for its beautiful colouring and twisting patterns. Once polished it has a rare lustre all of its own.

TechManual.value: A range of rather basic wines that have limited appeal.

items.TechManual: Bitter berries have a sharp acidic taste not unlike tasting a low voltage battery. While chewed they not only stain the teeth red but release a narcotic that relaxes.
The sweetberry is aptly named on account of its nearly addictive taste. It can be served on its own altough is often served with an alcoholic sorbet.
These are small cute lizard analogues that make interesting pets (and the occasional snack for some sentient species).

Aquawear is made from the skin of the arctic fish. The colouration of the materia is unique although quite delicate. It produces some of the strangest clothing, many of which play to the aquatic theme.
The tiger pike is a rare creature that tastes superb. It is a sought after delicasy that is highly prized by the Felini.
The rainbow sword is the bony nasal projection from the aquatic creature of this world. The sword is mountained as a beautiful ornament.

This small plaque is part of a hull salvaged from the wreck of the great battle over Straddle. They are classed as perishable not so much because they decay, but because interest in the battle will fade with time. Their value is based on the limited number available.
Hog meat is tender and juicy although does have a taste that is not to every person's liking.
Tarim Rams have to be reared from young in order to train them. They enjoy butting things including their owners.
Considered a delicacy by the Kastorians, the river eels are generally considered too sour or even disgusting by other races.

The tentacles of the squid are small and tender and prepared in a profusion of ways in order to bring out a single facet of their varied textures and tastes. They are a firm favourite with the Falconians.

The noxis root is locally known as the feelgood root for obvious reasons. It is generally chewed although can be brewed to form a potent black drink that can leave the consumer blissfull for an entire week.
These sea creatures ride waves, leaping and cavorting with little obvious relish. They are carnivores and snatch food caught up in the waves.
Tarim oil is extracted from the thick fatty tissue under the skins of the glasslands beasts. It is rich in unique lipids that are sought for a variety of uses. It is a firm favourite of the Naplians.
These naturally occuring incadescent rocks are found only on this planet. They have to be removed with care and kept in a methane atmosphere or they loose their glow.
This delicate syrup is a bright scarlet colour. Each drop, is collected individually from a single strand of lichen. This painstaking operation accounts for its outrageous price.
As Donkey Opals and Beach Opals both sounded lame, Shore Opals was accepted as their commercial name. The colouring is unique to opals from this planet.

These vicious monsters have to be kept sedated at all times. Due to their sheer size they are not really a match against modern weaponry, but are nonetheless a threat if allowed into civilian areas or unrestrained within a cargo bay.

Mohache folk music not only covers the tunes of the tundra herders but also authentic replicas of the instruments used to produce the sounds. While it does not appeal to the move discerning taste, natives seem to get a kick out of it.
Surk wine uses a unique chemical substitute for alcohol. This naturally decaying substance gives similar results to alcohol on account of its formula is much more predictable.
The dark meat is a firm favourite for the more primitive cultures within the Peripheries.

The fossils taken from Capella map the entire evolution of life on the planet. This is everything from faint pressings of soft bodies into mud through to bone skeletons and shells. It is quite an impressive range.
Surk shrimp takes a little to get used to, but once the translucent skin and visible organs are accepted the taste is palatable. It is a firm favourite amongst wimbles.
The meat from the domesticated native cattle is surprisingly tasty.
Beta Eggs are collected from the nests of the large avian creature. It is believed that the employees on the world have actually trained the creatures to bring the eggs to them.

This is a moss that grows throughout the vales of the mountains and can be found in virtually every nook and cranny. It is consumed while still green. It can be steeped in water as a tisane or consumed as is. Cooking is always light and swift so as not to damage the taste.

This covers a range of weapons from stun batons through to hunting lasers and side arms. The weapons while often lethal are still no match for standard mercenary gear. They are often banned on civilised worlds. They are a firm favourite amongst natives due to the advantage the give over contemporary weapons.
This covers a range of aquatic creatures that are a firm favourite amongst sentient aquatic lifeforms. Most terran lifeforms find them a little unappealing.
Crusader Clams cover a range of aquatic crustaceans. They have a distinctive taste that is prized by Flagritz throughout the galaxy.

Traditional mohache tales are curious to alien ears if not quite believable. Standard endings have the particular protagonist gaining a farm and having good harvests for the rest of his life. Variants on this end with a good meal or possibly last being seen venturing off to discover new lands perfect for farming. Only those tales hand written on books made from native materials are worth anything.
The finest aquatic life that this planet has to offer is well regarded by all that eat it.

TechManual.value: The spiny leaves from certain tundra heather is used as a herb.

items.TechManual: These are small silver fish. The taste is unique although many considered it an aquired one. They are however nutritious.
The sweet inner fibres of the lake plants are cooked in a number of ways though can be eaten raw.
Surf chowder is the combination of common luxury foods and surf jellyfish. The locals often consider this a way of disguising the jellyfish than accentuating it.

These berries are parasitic in nature and care must be taken to eat a ripe one. The manner of their production is something of a well kept secret. The wimbles favour these on account of their unusual taste.
The small cute alien pet is a must for any small humanoid, even it is to eat as a snack once boredom sets in. Maybe this is why the falconians like them so much.
This is made from the organic compounds produced by the fluffball. The strange nature of the substance is quite mesmerising and highly sought after by those in the trade.
The sickly sweet sap is a favourite amongst the hive. Maybe this is due to many of the species only being able to ingest liquid diets.
Rough-K is clothing of rare quality. The yarn is actually produced from a special moss.
The fur is long and luxurious. Patch work clothing is the norm as the fur is taken from small creatures only a few centimetres in length. The most expensive clothing comes from matched furs.
These pets are around 15cm in length and are very easy to keep. As their name suggests they are a bit dull but otherwise are calming pets.
This small and fairly cute burrowing creature is a reasonable pet (and possible snack for the felini).

A Democratic Native Ballot Voting Booth made by the DNA that allows Natives of planets to determine their future in a democratic state . To vote simply press a button under the picture of a proposed political and make a special indentation on an electronic screen digit/finger/retina scan screen. This stops multiple voting by the same native. Copyright Mad Max DNA @204

TechManual.value: This is a very nutritious aquatic plant.

items.TechManual: There are many species of edible shellfish that if made public knowledge would double in value (currently $0.5/mu).
This is a plant that tastes divine although only grows at certain times of the year in localised blooms. Careful monitoring of these is needed so that the kelp polyps can be collected with speed.
This is an streamlined ocean-aquatic creature. Entire shoals are dragged out at a time and roasted to produce a reasonable food.
The common shrimp from this world are large but soft shelled though quite tasty.
Prize cattle are unique to this world but well regarded by anyone that purchases them. They are especially sought after by knowledgably wimbles.
This covers a rare type of gemstone found only on this world. It is most appreciated by humans.
These delicious creatures are not well known. Their value can be increased to $0.8 by making them public knowledge.
These appear as large rugs with no obvious head or in fact other features. This is because they are all on the underside which is not covered in fur.

Detinus Effigies' are a new trade good aimed at giving citizens the opportunity to have a good old Effigy burning party of the evil Detinus leaders who have shown their murderous hands. Effigies should include Michelle 'Bloody Hands' Diaz, Cassius 'The Reaper' Jerusalem and Jacob 'Double Chin' Nelson (*relates to SSS 206.35.5)
These bridge the gap between plants and animals. They have a curious taste that many find appealing, especially the Felini.
These can also be seeded onto a water world as a special action. It generally requires 20 per sector to generate a stable population.
Care is taken to ensure that all salamanders are thoroughly dead before return to the base for processing. They are quite lethal to the unwary.
While the crustaceans are found in all colours, the best tend to be deep blues. The shells often scintillate in a manner similar to star sapphires, hence the name of the delicacy

Organically produced fertiliser from volcanic sources. It is heavy and worth next to nothing but readily available. It is also dangerous to store for long periods in bulk. It is however valuable to devloping agriculture.
The fresh butter, milk and array of cheeses are superior to any in the known Peripheries. The people of the world put this down to the unique weather, native flora and secret recipes.
Powell Eland is a graceful quadruped not too dissimilar to an old Earth antelope. It does however have superb meat and is highly prized and eaten raw by the Dewiek.
These are ornamental carvings made from the trees unique to this world.
The scarlet peal is a freshwater pearl produced by a rather uninteresting shellfish found in the lakes and rivers of Tarim.
Scarlet amber is named for its obvious colour. The best pieces had fossils of ancient life embedded within. It is highly prized amongst felini who name it blood rock.

The mushrooms found in the tundra regions have to be collected between inclement weather on account of their delicate nature. The mushrooms are exceedingly tasty and are used in a whole range of cuisines.

Spring berries grow close to natural thermal springs found in the frozen tundra regions. The microclimate allows them to produce fruit all year. Their taste is quite superb leading many to believe that they have been nurtured over long generations.

The gift shops around the mausoleum sell a number of items produced within the starbase. These include T-Shirts, Royal coats of arms, Recordings of the official video and Carlton incident footage (as narrated by tv's Duke West). As these gifts are sold locally they are not considered origin specific. While people visiting the mausoleum may buy the gifts here, they would probably not buy them elsewhere and certainly not at an inflated price. (While visiting Cairo, would you buy a tacky plastic model of the Eiffel Tower?)
This Eau de toilette is made from the concentration of a delicate flower with a barely perceptible fragrance.
While edible and possessed of a certain taste, they are generally not considered a luxury.

TechManual.value: The small aquatic life is best served cooked in oil and herbs.

items.TechManual: Artefacts from an ancient and extinct civilisation always pique the interest of the collectors and the Destrania are no exception. Humans tend to be the most inquisitive.
The river muscles are a single species amongst the many inedible ones that are common to the waterways of Beta. They are incredibly tasty and a firm favourite amongst the wimbles.

This covers a range of art including paintings, photographs, holographics and various ornaments reflexing the rare natural beauty of this world. As they majority are produced by felines, they appreciate it the most.
This useful black rock is a type of carbonaceous chondrite that is used extensively by some felini. It is fashioned into eating utensils as well as cladding. It's value reflects is mass.
These are kastorian civilians that have signed up to the Eridani colonisation program being sponsored by the Kastorian Military Junta.
The fruits are wild and quite interesting but are not well known. Their value can be increased to $0.9 by making them public knowledge.
This is extracted from a rare blue flower. The perfume is said to drive male wimbles crazy.
The weed is intensely coloured and delicate tasting though provides a number of nutrients. It can be used in a range of cooking.
These creatures spend much of their time sifting through mud for eggs to eat. They do however taste quite nice.

Sea greel is a large aquatic life form that tends to dwells along the cold coasts close to the cultivated sectors of Atriplex. It is not particularly popular as a delicacy although its scarcity accounts for the cost.
The tiny eggs from the guppy fish are quite pleasent though certainly not exceptional.
These seeds from the cooler latitudes are quite pleasent though somewhat oily.
These rather unassuming creatures are edible though not to most people's taste.

TechManual.value: These are unusal fungi that grow in isolated cold locations.

items.TechManual: Cheap tat commemorating the coronation of Lysander to Emperor of the Stellar Empire. Even alien might pay a few stellars for it. The value of the memorabilia will drop to zero by 210.30.
These fast breeding insects are in fact a few hundred different species that have a similar taste which is generally considered quite unappealing to all but xenophiles and hive.
This is incredibly soft and seems to strike a chord with the desires of naplians the universe over.
These are hand crafted by builder rats from the newly hatched wings of the unusual butterflies.
The seed is used as an exotic spice. It has a rather unusual taste that may be more palatable to one species.
Grown in the cool mountain valleys known as Smoker's Retreat. These are the finest blend, rolled on the hairy breasts of dwarf Mohache (of indeterminate gender).
These get their name from the reptiles that feed exclusively on them. They are very juicy and can be consumed directly or added to foods.
This common sand worms have a surprising taste that makes them very popular.
This covers on the very best fossils dating over the past billion years. They are generally sold as sets. The most highly prized ones show how the creatures evolved.
The shoop is a species of ground squirrel that has quite a remarkable tail. This is highly prized by humans as one of the finest furs in the galaxy.
A colourful title used for this primitive herbal cure to indicate that it should only be taken in small doses and then at need.
This covers a range of nutritious plants from the shallows of Jericho.
Jericho Shrimp bears as much resemblence to Earth Shrimp as a flagritz does to a human. It is edible and if undercooked is quite poisonous so at least has two common points.
These marine creatures are very common and quite tasty though catching them requires industrial lines on account of their powerful claws.
The maopod is a large edible aquatic creature. It is not relished by the Flagritz although many civilians are forced to eat it as it is freely available.

Decon mould has the ability to absorb heavy elements, allowing it to reduce background radiation levels on a world. It is also extremely resilient to environments hinting at its unnatural origins. It generally requires 100mu/sector per world to reduce the background radiation level by 1 point over 1 year.

The deglin finch is quite intelligent and capable of learning tricks. Its powerful wings means that it is even capable of bringing small objects to the pet owner. Flagritz have been known to train these to pick ribbons of flesh off restrained slaves and drop them in the mouths of slave owner.
These creatures are skinned for their scarlet skins. The skins are completely water resistent and are remarkably durable. They are generally used in the clothing industry.
Ceti luxuries are the produce from the best civilian operations in the cultivated sectors of the planet.
The cheese is made from the milk of a large herbivore. The taste of the cheese is very unusual to the point where only a few connoisseurs will consider eating it on a regular basis.
Various species of vegetation contribute towards what is generally known as Indar Lumber.
The taddies may look like slimy amphibians but taste remarkably good.
The bovus nodule is a small mass taken from the liver. Scores of animals have to be killed just to get a single mu of the substance. This explains its ridiculous price.
