Despite the name this is in fact an amphibian and a very tasty one at that.
This covers a number of insect pets that have some fairly impressive bio-luminescence.
Picking these fruits from their lowlying shrubs without protection is a good way of losing lots of blood. They are quite bitter and despite the unusual taste are not considered valuable locally.
A nice, high quality unique granite. Seeing the mountains from which it is taken however is vastly superior.
An unusual tasting pelagic plant that can be cooked in a number of ways or eaten raw.

TechManual.value: The plant is suitable for cattle consumption and pastures.

items.TechManual: These small creatures have shells that are a speckled deep green in colour. This makes them attractive despite their otherwise unspectacular taste.
Only certain parts of the crab are edible. The rest tastes strongly of iron sulphide and other sulphurous chemicals.
Melkior scents are collected from a few subspecies of the flowers dominating the grasslands of the world.
This covers a range of pre-prepared spicy foods by the civilians of this world.
This mineral is unusual in colour and is used as a veneer or facia.

The songthrush is a beautiful little alien bird that produces quite a fascinating tune that many describe as eerie or unnerving. They are all bright coloured but have scales on the underside of wings.

This covers a range of generic vegetation that are used by colonists in order to improve the infrastructure of the world. These improvements include establishment of pleasent parks, forests and many uses. Many of the plants also produce secondary crops, i.e. low value, low maintenance.
Produced by the native Callis faction this world-wide drink is potent but common on the world. Only by doube-refining it however is it suitable for drinking by off-worlders.
This range of clothing is woven from hive silk by the natives of the world in order to make quite exotic and ethnic costumes.
This fabric is made from the strange fronds from the forest vegetation. If treated with a naturally occuring counter inhibitor, the entire garment will harmlessly turn to liquid in seconds.
The arboreal cat is a vicious predator. It is hunted, stuffed and mounted and sold for exceptional amounts of money. It is especially prized by natives and primitive cultures.

The insects buried in the cultivated sectors produce this substance. While it contains large amounts of basic nutrients it has a very peculiar taste that some would find intensely satisfying (especially hive).
These creatures feed on the smaller species. Their meat is firm and a soft blue colour on account of the copper blood.
These seedlings are ground from imported stock from the far reaches of the Halo Periphery.

TechManual.value: This covers a range of unusual field crops.

items.TechManual: This category of beasts are highly suited to cold climates and can be exploited by civilians. This can be any or some of the following: eggs, hide, meat, bone, secretions (including milk), scales and blood.
Nelson lumber is used to make fine quality furniture and other useful goods commercial goods by civilian industries.

These strange creatures spend their lives half buried in the ground and have to be fed in order to survive by their keepers. They produce a milk although creatures milked away from the planet of origin produce only a bland substance that is however still edible.

TechManual.value: The plumage is quite unusual and makes them highly prized.

items.TechManual: This is a brainglow based substance. It is generally destined for the Mohache homeworld and those seeking enlightenment (and a good high).

EEM Inspectors are reputably incorruptible. If they are present in a base, they will annoy the personnel with their constant interfering and questioning. If stationed in a non-EEM position, they will be there for a reason, often to ensure that any investment is not being used for illicit purposes.

TechManual.value: This is water from the spring blessed by the Pope.

items.TechManual: These creatures reside in the rivers but are able to wriggle their way overland in a manner not unlike a snake. They have to return to the water within a few hours or they die. The meat has to be processed before it is edible, though is very unusual.
These are little more than ghoulish items dug from the ruins of the world. Most consider them distasteful though there is a dubious market for such items.

TechManual.value: The value of this item is known only to Hognn.

items.TechManual: Named after its deep purple colour, the fruit contains a very sweet juice.
These pets have sticky webbed appendages that they coil and fire in order to capture prey. Only the smallest species are kept as pets.

TechManual.value: This is a large juicy fruit that is often used for its juice.

items.TechManual: Desert plantlife covers a group of plants that are suitable for aiding in the terraforming of arid worlds. They can be seeded on worlds that have either no or very little life in order to establish vegetation in regions that currently have none. Normally 1,000mu's of desert plantlife is required in order to convert a flat lifeless terrain into a vegetation (probably plains) terrain. This plantlife can only be used on a world that has a breathable atmosphere. Multiple sectors can be seeded in a single special action although the GM is the final arbitrator on what will be effective.
Harvested by secret means from the depths of the desert by the hostile natives.
The small fish are found by the millions forming huge shoals. A fish has very little meat but it is unusual enough to have its own popularity.
The dragonfly roughly has a thirty centimetre wingspan. It also has four wings, two pairs overlapping on each side. The colourful creature can be trained to perform stunts and makes an excellent pet.
The fish is not considered as nice as the bison by the natives and is therefore generally only eaten by hunting packs.
This plant grows only along the streams leading from hot springs. It is very tasty and rich in minerals making it healthy.
These smal crawling semi-aquatic creatures live in the tundra streams but crawl onto land in order to feed on vegetation.
There are a number of foraging species in the jungles of Panacea that make for good eating.
Aliens have collected aqueous diamonds from the abyssal depths of a specific ocean from hydrothermal vents. Their worth is immediately obvious to anyone with even rudimentary appraisal skills.

TechManual.value: A wide range of tasty mushrooms picked from the wild.

items.TechManual: This powder taking orally heightens the senses and creates a sense of superiority in the user.
The delicate bark from this tree is prized as an expensive decoration. It does tend to crack and decay even with the best storage.

TechManual.value: The fist is as black as midnight, even its flesh is black.

items.TechManual: The native dewiek would never consider actively exploiting this flatfish for local sales but might eat it if they had to.
This is extracted from the seedpods of the common kelp. It is generally used in the cooking of other dishes rather than served on its own though can be served as a condiment.
The shells of the bivalves come in a range of colour. This is exploited by chefs that present an array of cooked scallops returned to their shells for presentation.
The small creatures coat themselves in sand that they bind together with mucus to form a semi-hard carapace. They are easily peeled and cooked.
The hexus is a six-legged sheep. It has unusually resilient furs making it highly prized, especially by naplians.
Due to rare and unusual minerals in the rocks, the fossils from certain strata are beautifully coloured and as such highly prized.

Every insect seems to belong to a different species. Some have six legs, some eight, some ten, and others 5 or 7. There genes have apparently decided that there is no point even trying to resist mutation. Despite the differences most of them are genetically compatible and all can breed asexually as well. The fascinating variety would make them suitable as common alien pets - you could truly have an ant farm with a difference.
Wallow pigs cannot be transported off world so all dishes have to be prepared on the planet prior to shipping.
Unicorn horns are formed under unique circumstances from volcanic rock. The curious twisting effect and delicate shading make them unique jewellery pieces.
Hunting of the bachelor herds of Sty Deer is considered quite exciting for the novice hunter. Naplians seem to like these trophies more so than other species.
The squid is one of the prized pelagic food of the desert world. They swim in shoals and are hotly fought over by the civilian operations.
The oil is taken from eggs found on remote and isolated sea atolls.
The musk is extracted from a small swamp frog. Despite, or possibly because of this hive go wild for the substance.

This is little more than yeast, insects fed on waste and photosynthesizing gunges that has been ground down, dried, flavoured and formed into pastes and cakes. It will keep you alive (1mu will feed 30 people for a week) but nobody would eat it if they could find anything else.
This is a unique green diamond found nowhere else in the universe (at least that is the selling point).
The hides of the tundra beasts are thick and dura ble. They are suited to many uses although are preferred by natives.

TechManual.value: The delicate bush normally only grows in alpine conditions.

items.TechManual: These uniquely mottled hides are taken from the small lizards. They are turned into all types of chic clothing.
Common livestock bred to be used as a cheap source of food by expanding civilian colonies. They are inferior to alien animals.
Bottle water from the naturally filtered springs of Newstart. Why does water that has been filtered over thousands of years have a sell-by date?
This small aquatic creature has an interesting and unique taste. It is generally served with bland food as its delicate taste is easily overpowered.
Only the tips are used for culinery purposes and these need to be picked while the plant is alive to prevent toxic seep from the stem.

While it can be sold as a life trade good, it can also be used to improve aqueous sectors that have been contaminated by hydrocarbon sources. 500mu used as a special action will generally restore a moderately contaminated sector.
This small metallic object, with no intrinsic value, is used as a token for the Peripheries Treasure Hunt.
These grubs produce some interesting enzymes that break down woody materials. They can be consumed with no harmful effects and aid cattle in foraging.
The meat is thick, juicy and often tender though by the end of the winter, lasting 16 years it can be stringy.
This is one of the many assisstants of Dr. Maxillious. He has been trained to carry out experiments in the field.

This covers a range of fruit that grow on the trees in the forests of Mobile Bay. They are generally untended and while originally genetically modified hundreds of years ago, they have adapted and become wild.
The curium meat is edible although most consider it to be a little unpalatable.
Alcoline is a complex chemical that produces similar effects to alcohol in humans. It does not however have as many detrimental side effects such as hangovers and liver damage.
Jewel fish are only exploited for their remarkle and unique scales. These hard pearlescent scales come in many shades.
This is one of the tastiest meats in the Peripheries. Some will go to extreme lengths just to get a small cut.
The meat from the pelagic creature is firm and tasty, though best consumed while fresh.
The tigress is a phenomenal huntress and capable of ripping even an armed troop when in its home environment.
Petrawood is a natural silicate produced by a living plant. The 'organic' stone is quite elegant although its bulk means that it is a high bulk luxury.

These know about collecting precious minerals on a few alien worlds.
They are part of the training missions and have no uses beyond this.
This is a refined, sweet smelling sap that is used to annoint the body. Wimbles can't get enough of it although they do not reveal why.
Although the wood has no particular outstanding features the physical dimensions of the tree make processing a simple matter and planks of a large size can be produced.
Old books and various new media covering everything of the old Confederate. Modern works focus on the change from Confederacy to Caliphate.
The steaks are taken from a number of species found across the world.
This jewellery is made from unique gems found under kilometres of glacial ice.
A very palatable green seaweed. It can be cooked in a variety of manners although tastes superb is simple washed and served raw.
Grown by the natives the world the blueberry is odd tasting but sought-after. It also has an oil that is distilled to make a rather unusual perfume.
Food derived from the creatures dwelling in the shallows of Meluhha.
Meat from the grassland herbivores of Asith. A six legged beast which roams in small herds, grazing on the plentiful grass.
The clams are massive and a single one will provide an ample meal for tens of people. The taste is quite unusual.
Cephalopod found in the seas of Meluhha. Particularly appealing to Felini.
The molluscs can normally be found in the southern polar regions. The shells are quite beautiful and used for ornaments and jewellery.
This lichen has a rather distinctive taste that is considered exquisite by nearly all that try it.
The hide, taken from an underground creatures is a pearly white colour and much prized in the fashion industry.
The seeds of the tumble weeds are only edible after roasting in order to crack the shells.

TechManual.value: Only the meat is of value on this mammoth beasts.

items.TechManual: The fruit is a large blue, rounded cylinder, segmented into six parts. Each segment contains a cluster of seeds and a sweet, moisture laden pulp.
Nuts found in the Hannor jungle. A tasty treat for the residents.

TechManual.value: These are hunted for their remarkably soft white fur.
These eggs look less than appertising but taste remarkable.
This is a rare perfume that is highly sought after.

items.TechManual: The meat has a distinctive taste that is not appealing to everyone but there are those that consume this on a regular basis and will pay over the odds for it.
This small gland produces some of the finest drugs in the known galaxy.

TechManual.value: Civilians from the Coptuv system looking for a better life.

items.TechManual: The scarlet piranha is tiny but brightly coloured. They hunt in shoals, working together in order to devour much larger prey, bones and all.
Reef crabmeat is tender although quite strong tasting and definitely for the more discerning palate.

TechManual.value: This rough drink is still very popular for its unique taste.
The bright feathers find exceptional favour with the Falconians.
The meaty fish has an appealing taste.

items.TechManual: Large predator fish found in the rivers of Durobrivaes grasslands.
This is cloth weaved from a vine. It is considered quiite nice by most colonists and it is durable and unlike artificial fibres quite comfortable.
Common aquatic flora found in the shallows of Durobrivae. Edible but not very exciting.
This is an incredibly refreshing drink made by the tailess monks of Cheetah. It is produced from a mixture of their jealously guarded vines and a wild fruits.
There are many small creatures in the shallows of Segundo that are ideal for aquariums. They are brightly coloured, have interesting behaviours and are easy to maintain.
These are found only on this world and take millions of years to form.

TechManual.value: Aquatic plant produced on Durobrivae.

items.TechManual: These unique gems are found only on Orchard in the Forest system. The formation process responsible is poorly understood.
Relatively cheap fashion clothing and accessories geared up for humans.
These are small avian creatures that make great pets. They are prone to dieing.
These small cute creatures are prized not only for their colour but also their song.

Even though farmers often require machines that are much larger than implements these machines also need maintenance and spares. As such the return on production of machines built for off-world transport is much lower than that of implements. Normally these sorts of items are built specifically for the world by the local infrastructure and as such competition is much fiercer. As such building the 10mu agricultural machines is rarely worth the effort except where it fills a commercial niche.
Smart paper with the latest (sometimes) news from GTT HQ in Capellan.
These beasts are quite fearsome due to their enormous size and alien appearence.
These are the feathers from the common avian creatures that are found across the planet. They are made into spectacular clothing as well as used for more practical uses as luxury stuffing.
Arboreal hogs are small and ugly but are affectionate and well regarded as pets.
Taken from the large animals of the jungles, this ivory analogue is prized throughout the galaxy - at least by the unscrupulous.

TechManual.value: Terrans looking to live in the Inner Capellan Periphery.

items.TechManual: These have been bred from isolated strains of dressler worms. While they taste reasonable, they are not the most appertising cut of meat. Still they are somewhat unique.
Purchasers of these fish often sort and grade them on account of the range of fish produced.

The stained and etched glass is due to the presence of a micro-organism within the sand at the time of fireing. The process is very complicated in order to preserve both the colour and the internal etching by the results are impressive. It is however quite fragile and tends to be destroyed.
Unique colours and patterns to this world. While highly prized it is still bulky, giving it a low value to mass ratio.
These are the rare and tasty eggs from the billed birds. Maybe some of the appeal is from knowing that the bird is endangered.
These are unique to the world on account of the formation process and the presence of trace minerals. They are also exceptionally beautiful.
These are served live where possible in order to maintain their taste. They are appreciated by the hive.
Essentially water with a few trace minerals from the mountain streams of Tyburn.
These have a strange and unique taste but some find the texture not to their liking.
Colonists, unlike civilians (whose sale to a world is considered their fare) are people looking to for free passage to a new world. Their only value is in being seeded into the planetary population.

TechManual.value: A variety of filter feeding fish analogues. Almost tasty.
Predatoru fish analogues found in the seas.

items.TechManual: Aquaphid art is something of a mystery to anyone but the aquaphids. While some art critiques will have samples to show their appreciation of other cultures and species, common opinion is that they are probably simply being pretentious.
Super cool gel is a must for all explorers venturing to hot worlds. It is also a must for all sun bathers in Blue Star systems and worlds within the inner orbits. Smells nice too.
This covers a range of meats that are classed as unusual, i.e. not food. Most of these are popular with the Dewiek.
A range of organic material used for animal bedding. Usually absorbant and, easily stored and disposed of.
Meat from a fish analogue that only really appeals to the human palate.

Not just an AI secretary but so much more with many ad-ons making them better in many ways than real friends. As well as an expensive trade item they are also an advanced infrastructure item, given to executives and politicians as perks.

TechManual.value: Spice produced from ground spores of the aquatic flora.

items.TechManual: A silicate exoskeleton that forms around aquatic flora. There are slight alterations in colour throughout the growth.
Wood with a high density and characteristics suitable for heavy construction.

TechManual.value: The edible cuts of meat from the forest herbivores.
A slender red fruit with a sweet taste.
A large predator avian with a five metre wingspan.
A large elusive river fish.

items.TechManual: A range of foodstuff that is not generally suitable for common consumption but can provide nutrition to life forms with hardier digestive systems.
A light weight, leather like material derived from small aquatic creatures.
The carapace plates of a large aquatic creature. Usualy used as a decorative item.
A compound which induces a mild euphiric effect. May also cause uncontrolled vomiting.

TechManual.value: A plant with edible roots suited to cold weather agriculture.
A stimulating beverage brewed from a moss analogue.
A cylindrical fungus that needs some preparation before eating.
A predatory avian capable of group hunting. Used for sport.
A drug which induces a euphoric delirium.
Meat from the large cylindrical fish analogues.

items.TechManual: A drug which induces an intense but short lived burst of euphoria followed by a lengthy headache.

TechManual.value: A bitter tasting fruit thet initially serves as foliage.
Avian eggs. As delicious as they are hard to collect.

items.TechManual: A herbivore which produces a number of useful products such as meat and leather.
A timber with dense fibres and good characteristics for light construction.

TechManual.value: A tuber which forms the backbone of the local populations diet.

items.TechManual: Large omnivores which provide meat, fur and a few other products.

TechManual.value: A fish found in deeper waters that has meat rich in fatty oils.

items.TechManual: Large aquatic predators which can be exploited for a number of useful products.

TechManual.value: A small molusc which needs proper preparation before consuming.
Edible avian eggs.
An edible but unappealling marine invertebrate.
A spice produced from dried roots.
A cattle creature suited to low gravity worlds.

items.TechManual: An aquatic plant which is useful for developing agriculture on high temperature worlds.

TechManual.value: A crsutacean which needs to be consumed as fresh as possible.
A fresh water fish analogue.

items.TechManual: A honey like substance produced by non social insects. Difficult to collect in large quantities.

TechManual.value: A range of small, edible fish analogues.

items.TechManual: An aquatic invertebrate which can be quite toxic if caught and eaten following its torpid state.
An aquatic flora which needs boiling for several hours before it can be eaten.

TechManual.value: A fine leather taken from an amphibious predator.

items.TechManual: Various trinkets and baubles some of a dubious nature produced by the natives of Mithras.
Microorganisms with some value in low temperature industrial processes.
A grass analogue which contains fungicides of use in agricultural development.

TechManual.value: Edible aquatic flora.
An edible aquatic weed.

items.TechManual: Valuable objects of an esoteric nature giving a little insight into the history of the race.Rumour has it that KAS authorities have a tendency of destroying the items.

TechManual.value: Bone sections of a large aquatic filter feeder.
Bacteria which has some indutrial value.
Basic fish analogues which can be used as a source of protein.
Former IND Political

items.TechManual: Sentient Militia are technologically advanced people that come to the aid of a faction in a time of crisis. They are inferior to mercenaries but better than native troops due to access to superior weapons. Being unvetted they are a potential security risk.

Human Militia are technologically advanced people that come to the aid of a faction in a time of crisis. They are inferior to mercenaries but better than native troops due to access to superior weapons. Being unvetted they are a potential security risk.

Dewiek Militia are technologically advanced people that come to the aid of a faction in a time of crisis. They are inferior to mercenaries but better than native troops due to access to superior weapons. Being unvetted they are a potential security risk.

Felini Militia are technologically advanced people that come to the aid of a faction in a time of crisis. They are inferior to mercenaries but better than native troops due to access to superior weapons. Being unvetted they are a potential security risk.

Naplian Militia are technologically advanced people that come to the aid of a faction in a time of crisis. They are inferior to mercenaries but better than native troops due to access to superior weapons. Being unvetted they are a potential security risk.
